details: ['Inter Cars Greece Single Member Liability Company is a subsidiary of Inter Cars S.A., the biggest importer and distributor of automotive spare parts and garage equipment in Middle and Eastern Europe. With over 200 branches in Poland and more than 190 branches in Europe, Inter Cars Greece values passion and involvement, partnership, reliability, loyalty, and leadership by example.', 'Inter Cars Greece is interested in appointing a Product Specialist for the LKW Segment in the Athens Metropolitan Area. The right candidate will contribute to the team and help achieve the corporate goals.', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Analyze the market in terms of competition, product mix, pricing, market sharing facilitating advanced excel functions and skills.', 'Support the growth plan of the purchasing department.', 'Play an integral part of the team that has as a major objective to multiply the segment size.', 'Handling the cycle of supplies and equipment.', 'Develop and maintain professional relationships with all suppliers. Maintain quality of purchasing procedures.', 'Ensure compliance with all purchasing policies. Evaluate all quotes and coordinate with vendors to provide required component bids and analyze all vendor performance to improve all purchasing process.', 'Design and implement various purchasing strategies and procurement. Participate in all supplier selection and pricing reduction programs in coordination with global supply chain team. Determine appropriate programs for all purchase requirements and assist in reducing supply chain costs.', 'Provide network support, execute and check if the purchasing processes have been followed and provide an effective interface with all departments and branches. Ensure that there is an efficient ABC analysis and keep stocks of the shop under close supervision.', 'Coordinate with all internal departments in terms of priorities to ensure efficiencies, scale economies and effectiveness of the purchasing system.', 'Requirements', 'Requirements', 'BSc in Engineering, Business Administration or related field. MSc will be considered as a strong asset.', 'Advanced excel skills are essential.', 'Strong presentation, verbal and written communication skills (English and Greek).', 'Strong technical skills, analytical ability and attention to detail.', '3-5 yearsâ€™ work experience in a similar role required.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Ability to work as a team member and independently when required.', 'Office 365 strong knowledge required.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Skills development scheme', 'Career advancement in a multinational corporate environment', 'Additional private health insurance scheme', 'Due to the high volume of applications only high final candidates will be conducted. Inter Cars promotes privacy and confidentiality and aims to protect candidatesâ€™ personal data, in accordance with General Data Protection Regulation (Reg. 2016/679) requirements and national legislation.']

details: ['Volton Hellenic Energy SA is a Greek company that is dynamically active and is rapidly increasing its capacity in the field of Electricity Supply and Trading, in the Gas Energy Sector and in the field of Telecommunications (through Orizon).', 'Volton', "By offering reliable services that meet the ever-growing energy needs of businesses and households, Volton aims to build solid and trustful relationships with its customers. The company's ambition is to become one of the most important companies in the industry and remain at the forefront of developments as the first multiservice provider combining Electricity, Natural Gas and Telecommunications.", ', Volton', 'As part of its development Volton strengthens its human resources in Athens and seeks a Product Manager (Energy).', 'Volton', 'Athens', 'Product Manager (Energy).', 'The Product Manager plays a critical role in driving the development and optimization of Voltonâ€™s energy product portfolio, encompassing electricity and natural gas. This role aligns with our mission to deliver innovative, sustainable, and customer-focused energy solutions, ensuring Volton remains a leader in the electrical energy supply industry. By blending strategic vision with hands-on execution, the Product Manager contributes to achieving business growth and customer satisfaction.', 'Product Manager', 'Voltonâ€™s', 'Volton', 'Product Manager', 'Oversee the full lifecycle of energy products, from conceptualization and design to implementation and market introduction', 'Develop strategies for product enhancements based on customer feedback, competitive analysis, and market trends', 'Conduct periodic SWOT analysis to inform strategic decisions', 'Analyze market situation, trends, regulatory developments, and competitor offerings to identify opportunities for innovation and differentiation', 'Deploy go-to-market strategies and tactics within agreed timelines and budgets', 'Cooperate cross-functionally with Legal, Sales, MarCom, Operations, CX, Customer Care and Technical teams for successful product launches', 'Collaborate with external partners and vendors to support product development initiatives', 'Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success, such as market share, revenue growth, and customer satisfaction', 'Responsible for P&L and financial analysis for the assigned portfolio', 'Increase customer retention rates through product innovations and contribute to the achievement of annual revenue and growth targets', 'Prepare detailed reports and presentations for senior leadership on product performance and future initiatives', 'Act as an ambassador of the products within the organization', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field; A Masterâ€™s degree will be a plus', '5 years of experience in product management, experience within the energy sector will be strongly appreciated', 'Certifications in Product Management are a plus', 'Solid understanding of energy markets, particularly electricity and natural gas', 'Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau) and project management software (e.g. Jira)', 'Strong leadership and team management capabilities', 'Excellent communication skills to convey complex concepts to diverse audiences', 'Critical thinking and problem-solving abilities', 'Customer-centric approach with a focus on delivering value', 'Innovative mindset to drive product differentiation', 'Strong organizational skills with attention to detail', 'A competitive fixed salary package aligned with your experience and expectations', 'Hybrid working model', 'Private insurance, corporate benefits and perks', 'Continuous training and professional development', 'Excellent professional environment', 'Modern and productive working facilities', 'Donâ€™t miss the chance to join a Great Place to Work-Certified Company that fosters a positive work environment, proudly recognized as a Best Workplace for Women 2025.', 'Great Place to Work-Certified Company', 'Best Workplace for Women 2025', 'All applications will be treated with confidentiality. If your CV meets the requirements of the job, we will contact you by phone to schedule an appointment. Information about the company on our site volton.gr', 'volton.gr']

['Hemmersbach provides IT infrastructure services in more than 190 countries with 50 own subsidiaries. We deliver exclusively for the leading companies in the IT industry. We go the extra mile â€“ we not only simply enthuse our customers, but also make the world a better place: 20% of our profits go into our Direct Actions Hemmersbach Rhino Force and Hemmersbach Kidsâ€™ Family. Thatâ€™s why Hemmersbach is The Social Purpose IT Company.', 'Hemmersbach', 'Role:', 'Role:', 'Ensure timely and accurate filing of VAT returns for German entities.', 'Monitor and implement changes in VAT legislation.', 'Provide guidance and support to internal teams on VAT-related matters.', 'Act as the point of contact for external auditors and tax consultants.', 'Ensure compliance with German financial and tax regulations.', 'Stay updated on legislative changes and their impact on the organization.', 'Prepare and review monthly financial statements in accordance with local accounting standards.', 'Reconcile general ledger accounts and ensure timely reporting.', 'Support strategic decision-making with expert tax advice.', 'Work with the finance team to streamline monthly closing procedures.', 'Requirements:', 'Requirements:', 'Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in German.', 'Certified Accountant (Bilanzbuchhalter) or equivalent professional qualification (Steuerfachwirt / Steuerberater).', 'Proven experience in VAT compliance and monthly financial closings, preferably for German entities.', 'Proficiency in accounting software and reporting tools (e.g., DATEV or MS Dynamics).', 'Strong knowledge of German (HGB) and tax regulations.', 'Ability to manage deadlines and work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Buddy program.', 'International environment.', 'Job with purpose.', 'Mobile working.', 'Staff discounts.', 'Unlimited employment contract.', 'Private Life and Health Insurance.', 'Joining Hemmersbach, you will support our commitment to social responsibility. We prioritize 20% of our profits into our company owned organizations such as:', 'Rhino-force.org: providing environmental protection for an endangered species', 'Kids-family.org: taking care of children without parents in Poland and India, turning their shelters into homes.']

role: Data Engineer â€“ Cyprus or Greece
details: ['Data Engineer â€“ Cyprus or Greece', 'Data Engineer â€“ Cyprus or Greece', 'The Role:', 'The Role:', 'We are seeking for skilled and motivated Data Engineers to join our dynamic Business Intelligence (BI) and Data Science (DS) teams. The successful candidates will work with leading experts on cutting-edge projects relating to the definition and development of efficient big data structures, data cleansing techniques and design and optimisation of data infrastructure and pipelines.', 'The main responsibilities of the position include:', 'The main responsibilities of the position include:', 'Understand data requirements and develop efficient data models and structures.', 'Design, build, and maintain scalable and reliable data structures, pipelines and processes.', 'Execute queries in both relational and non-relational databases.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and enforce data governance policies and data security best practices.', 'Monitor, troubleshoot and resolve issues regarding data quality, data pipeline failures, and data infrastructure.', 'Stay up to date with emerging trends and technologies in the data engineering and data management field and recommend innovative solutions to enhance our data infrastructure and processes.', 'Main requirements:', 'Main requirements:', 'BSc/MSc in Computer Science, Physics/Science, Engineering. Mathematics or other relevant field', 'Experience in data manipulation and big-data processing frameworks is a plus.', 'Good knowledge of SQL and experience with relational databases is a plus.', 'Familiarity with ETL processes, data warehousing concepts, and related technologies is a plus.', 'Programming experience with Python or any high-level programming language is a plus.', 'Experience with Unix/Linux is a plus.', 'Good knowledge of data visualisation techniques.', 'Self-motivated and passionate for working with data.', 'Eagerness for continuous professional development.', 'Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with attention to detail.', 'Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.', 'Benefit from:', 'Benefit from:', 'Attractive remuneration package', 'Private health insurance', 'Corporate pension fund', 'Intellectually stimulating work environment', 'Continuous personal development and international training opportunities', 'Type of employment: Full time', 'Location: Cyprus or Greece', 'Please visit our website www.xm.com/careers to submit your online application for this position.', 'All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality!', 'All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality!']

role: Lead Data Scientist - Cyprus or Greece
details: ['Lead Data Scientist â€“ Cyprus or Greece', 'The Role:', 'The Role:', 'We are seeking a Lead Data Scientist with expertise in behavioral analytics to drive data-driven strategies for client onboarding, engagement, retention, and personalization. You will analyze customer behavior, develop predictive models, and deliver insights that enhance the client journey.', 'As a key leader, you will collaborate across teams, mentor data scientists, and shape customer-centric analytics. Your work will fuel growth, optimize user experiences, and drive impactful business decisions.', 'Join us to transform client engagement through the power of data!', 'The main responsibilities of the position include:', 'The main responsibilities of the position include:', 'Client Acquisition: Utilise advanced analytics, and predictive modeling to drive client acquisition strategies.', 'Client Acquisition:', 'Client Onboarding Optimization: Analyse user behavior during onboarding to identify friction points and improve the overall user experience.', 'Client Onboarding Optimization', 'Client Segmentation: Develop and refine data-driven segmentation models to categorize clients based on behavior, demographics, and engagement.', 'Client Segmentation', 'Churn Prediction: Build predictive models to identify at-risk customers and collaborate with business teams to develop effective retention strategies.', 'Churn Prediction', 'Recommendation Systems: Design and implement personalized recommendation algorithms to enhance client engagement and drive cross-sell and upsell opportunities.', 'Recommendation Systems', 'Machine Learning & AI Implementation: Leverage advanced machine learning techniques (supervised, unsupervised, and deep learning) to extract meaningful insights from client behavior data.', 'Machine Learning & AI Implementation', 'A/B Testing & Experimentation: Design, execute, and analyze A/B tests to optimize processes and improve decision-making.', 'A/B Testing & Experimentation', 'Data-Driven Decision-Making: Work closely with product, marketing, and business teams to integrate data-driven insights into strategic initiatives.', 'Data-Driven Decision-Making', 'Big Data Processing: Manage large-scale datasets, ensuring data quality, efficient feature engineering, and seamless data pipeline integration.', 'Big Data Processing', 'Leadership: Mentor and guide multiple teams, fostering innovation and technical excellence.', 'Leadership', 'Stakeholder Communication: Present insights and model outcomes to non-technical stakeholders, translating complex data into actionable recommendations.', 'Stakeholder Communication', 'Main requirements:', 'Main requirements:', 'PhD or MSc in Data Science, Physics, Mathematics Computer Science or a related field', '8+ years of experience in data science, with a focus on client behaviour analytics. Experience within the fintech or e-commerce industry will be considered an advantage.', 'Hands-on experience with recommender systems (collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models).', 'Strong experience with machine learning, deep learning, and statistical modelling.', 'Proficiency in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch) and SQL.', 'Proven experience with big data analytics.', 'Experience with NLP/AI tools for customer interaction analysis.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Effective communication skills to convey data-driven insights.', 'Proven leadership, team coaching, and management skills', 'Fluency in English.', 'Benefit from:', 'Benefit from:', 'Attractive remuneration package', 'Private health insurance', 'Corporate pension fund', 'Intellectually stimulating work environment', 'Continuous professional development and international training opportunities', 'Type of employment: Full time', 'Location: Cyprus or Greece', 'Please visit our website www.xm.com/careers to submit your online application for this position.', 'All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality!', 'All applications will be treated with strict confidentiality!']

details: ['Who we are', 'Who we are', 'Etraveli Group is the globally leading company for tech solutions and fulfillment capabilities for online sales of flights. We are here to solve complexity, by connecting millions of flights and travelers across the globe, from search and selection to trip and beyond. We hold consumer online travel agency brands like Mytrip, GoToGate & Flight Network and serve Booking.com with flights. Etraveli Group has also established strategic partnerships with companies like Skyscanner, Google Flights, TUI, etc.', 'Every day we strive to make the world smaller for our customers and bigger for our people. Our diverse team of more than 2500 passionate professionals is what makes us the industryâ€™s tech wonder and the best in the world at what we do. Our major offices are in Sweden (HQ), Canada, Greece, India, Poland with the Athens office being one of the largest, hosting around 640 employees working from the center of Athens for the rest of the world.', 'Job Overview:', 'Job Overview:', 'We are seeking a talented and passionate Data Scientist to join our finance automation team. As a Data Scientist, you will play a crucial role in extracting valuable insights from complex datasets, developing predictive models, and providing data-driven recommendations to solve critical business challenges. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product, finance, and other business stakeholders, to drive innovation and improve decision-making across the organization.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Data Exploration and Preprocessing:', 'Collect, clean, and transform large and complex datasets from various sources.', 'Identify and handle missing data, outliers, and inconsistencies.', 'Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to understand data patterns, distributions, and relationships.', 'Engineer new features to improve the performance of machine learning models.', 'Model Development and Deployment:', 'Design, develop, and evaluate machine learning models for tasks such as classification, regression, clustering, forecasting, and anomaly detection.', 'Utilize a variety of statistical and machine learning techniques (e.g., deep learning, natural language processing, time series analysis).', 'Implement and deploy models into production environments, ensuring scalability and reliability.', 'Monitor model performance and retrain models as needed.', 'Data-Driven Insights and Communication:', 'Analyze model outputs and business data to identify actionable insights and trends.', 'Visualize data and present findings in a clear, concise, and compelling manner to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Communicate effectively with stakeholders to understand their needs and translate business questions into data science problems.', 'Document methodologies, algorithms, and results clearly and comprehensively.', 'Collaboration and Innovation:', 'Collaborate with data engineer to build and maintain data pipelines and infrastructure.', 'Work closely with product managers and business stakeholders to identify opportunities for leveraging data science to drive business value.', 'Stay up to date with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.', 'Contribute to the development of best practices and standards within the data science team.', 'Experiment with new tools and techniques to improve data science workflows and outcomes.', 'Requirements', 'Education:', "Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, or a related discipline. A Master's or Ph.D. degree is preferred.", 'Experience:', '5+ years of experience in a data science role or equivalent experience involving data analysis, statistical modeling, and machine learning.', 'Proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models in a real-world setting.', 'Technical Skills:', 'Strong proficiency in at least one programming language commonly used in data science (e.g., Python, R).', 'Experience with relevant data science libraries and frameworks (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, pandas, NumPy).', 'Solid understanding of statistical concepts and machine learning algorithms.', 'Experience with database systems and SQL.', 'Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Seaborn).', 'Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP, databricks) and their data science services is a plus.', 'Soft Skills:', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills.', 'Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.', 'Strong business acumen and the ability to translate data insights into business recommendations.', 'Curiosity and a passion for learning and exploring new technologies.', 'Benefits', 'We are looking for people who would make the world smaller for travelers but want a bigger world of opportunities for themselves. With us you can enjoy:', 'We are looking for people who would make the world smaller for travelers but want a bigger world of opportunities for themselves. With us you can enjoy:', 'Health Benefits - Through partners, we offer a private health insurance plan. We also offer the possibility to use 2 extra medical leave days in case of need.', 'Health Benefits', 'Monthly ticket restaurant card - to spend in one of the thousands affiliated restaurants, cafes, stores or supermarkets across Greece.', 'Monthly ticket restaurant card', 'Hybrid working environment - having the opportunity to work both remotely and at the office enabling you flexibility! #LI-Hybrid', 'Hybrid working environment', 'Office in the City â€“ We sit on bright, large floors (over 4000ã¡!) in central Athens. Just a short walk from the Ambelokipi Metro station.', 'Team activities - We also like to schedule company/department/team activities and events outside the office space!', 'Team activities', 'Fun & Work - We have a relaxed work environment where you can enjoy free breakfast, beverages & fruits, playing ping pong or video games.', 'Fun & Work', '*If interested, please send your CV in English*', 'At Etraveli Group we value diversity; we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds. During hiring, we are committed to ensure equality and promote diversity in the workplace at every selection stage. As such, we provide the same opportunities for all candidates regardless of race, religion or belief, gender, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, or any other characteristic protected under any anti-discrimination law or regulation.', '#LI-LO1']

role: Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence Engineer
details: ['Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence Engineer', 'As a Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence Engineer', 'your role will include', ':', 'Collaborating with Business Analysts and Data Analysts to gather client requirements and transform data into actionable insights', 'Designing, building, and maintaining Dimension and Fact tables, ensuring alignment with business requirements', 'Creating and managing data interfaces, including dashboards, data visualizations, ad-hoc reports, and querying tools for end-users', 'Quickly understanding and adapting to business objects across different sectors and ensuring the smooth integration of these into business intelligence solutions', 'Supporting the continuous improvement of data management processes and ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and reliability', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', 'A degree in Computer Science or a relevant field', 'At least 2 years of solid experience in the IT sector, with a proven track record in Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence Engineering', 'Proficiency in PL/SQL, Data Mining, Data Visualization, Oracle BI Presentation Service, SQL queries, Data Transformation, Data Modeling, Oracle Database, and Business Intelligence concepts', 'Knowledge of Oracle BI Publisher, ETL processes, Data Integration, and Oracle BI Scheduler', 'Familiarity with Oracle Analytic Server and experience using the Oracle BI Administration Tool (RPD) for modeling will be a distinct advantage', 'A strong understanding of business objects, particularly in industries like healthcare (e.g., Patients, Clinics, Operating Theaters, Admissions, Discharges) will be a bonus', 'Excellent command of the English language (both written and verbal)', 'Strong communication skills, an ability to collaborate effectively, and a problem-solving mindset', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'The opportunity to work in a modern environment & in a hybrid working model', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal and commuting allowance', 'Well-being activities (on premises)', 'Continuous learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings)', 'A personalized development plan for targeted career growth', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.']

['What Impact will you make?', 'What Impact will you make?', 'Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?', 'opportunity', 'Thessaloniki', 'hybrid working model', 'Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?', 'large scale', 'projects for industry-leading clients', 'career', 'international level', 'If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!', 'opportunity', 'You bring passion, we bring opportunities!', '#YourOpportunity', '#YourOpportunity', 'Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.', 'Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.', '#YourServiceLine', '#YourServiceLine', 'Audit & Assurance', 'Audit & Assurance', 'At Deloitte, meeting expectations is where Audit & Assurance begins. By bringing bright minds, effective processes, and world-class technologies from across our global organization while drawing on our years of experience, we empower our people to deliver an impact beyond expectations.', '#AboutYourTeam', '#AboutYourTeam', 'Our Accounting & Reporting Assurance team is looking to recruit a team of dynamic and high calibre professionals to join us at various levels, from Junior Consultant up to Experienced Professionals.', 'Accounting & Reporting Assurance', 'At Deloitte, every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. As the undisputed leader in professional services, Deloitte is where youâ€™ll find unrivalled opportunities to succeed and realise your full potential.', 'The Team', 'Our Assurance team, which consists of professionals with diverse skills and backgrounds ranging from ACA/ACCA qualified members, CFA candidates to mathematicians and statisticians, provides among others, the following services:', 'Accounting and advisory support', 'IFRS 9 advisory support both for Banking and Corporate clients', 'Credit risk model validation services', 'Development of accelerator tools using data analytics', '#AboutYourRole', '#AboutYourRole', 'As an Assurance Consultant, your responsibilities include:', 'Assurance Consultant', 'Participating in large Assurance engagements in Cyprus and the Middle Eastern region, mainly within the financial services industry, both onsite and remotely', 'Supporting Deloitteâ€™s external audit teams on IFRS 9 reviews through challenging our clientsâ€™ methodological approaches and quality of implementation', 'Replicating/re-building statistical models with the use of raw data and assessing model outputs', 'Providing credit measurement modelling and analytics services to clients either by building new models or improving/reviewing existing ones', 'Supporting other assurance-related projects such as: validation of credit risk models, IFRS transformations, and accounting & reporting advisory engagements', 'Developing solutions and recommendations, summarizing findings, drafting reports and presenting results to clients', 'Helping clients with designing and improving their wider credit measurement ecosystems; for example, practices around data, controls, model risk management, model monitoring, and maintenance and reporting', 'Supporting the senior management of the team in developing and winning new business, including assisting with proposal development', '#OurRequirements', '#OurRequirements', 'To qualify for the role you must have:', 'Undergraduate degree from a reputable university in Mathematics, Accounting & Finance, Economics, Operational Research, Data Science, Data Analytics or any other related discipline', 'Professional qualifications (such as ACA, ACCA, CFA, FRM) will be considered an advantage', 'Both university graduates without any prior work experience and professionals with up to 6 years of relevant work experience will be considered', 'Ability to communicate complex concepts to non-expert audiences', 'Knowledge of modelling software such as SAS, SQL, Python, R will be considered an advantage', 'Experience with data visualisation', 'Excellent analytical and reporting skills', 'Strong computer literacy, including Microsoft Word, Excel (including VBA), Power Point', 'Excellent command of the English language, both verbal and written', '#WhatWeOffer', '#WhatWeOffer', 'At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:', 'ğŸ  Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working', 'âš– Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)', 'ğŸŒ Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.', 'ğŸ“š Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends', 'ğŸš€ Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust', 'ğŸ¤¼ Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work', 'ğŸ‰ Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities', 'ğŸƒ A buddy to support you with your onboarding', 'ğŸŒ´ Extra days of annual leave', 'âš• Private medical health insurance plan', 'ğŸ’³ Ticket restaurant card', 'ğŸ›’ Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others', 'ğŸ“± Mobile phone', 'ğŸ Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices', 'Please note that all well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.', 'About Deloitte', 'About Deloitte', '#OurServices', '#OurServices', 'Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit, Technology & Transformation, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.', '#OurPurpose', '#OurPurpose', "We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. Itâ€™s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.", '#OurValues', '#OurValues', 'At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.', '#OurTalentExperience', '#OurTalentExperience', 'From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.', 'Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.', 'Sounds like the sort of role for you? Apply now.', 'Location: Thessaloniki', 'Location:']

role: Data Privacy and Protection - Cyber GRC Professional - Cybersecurity
details:
["Master's Degree, or equivalent, in Information Security, Cyber Security, Information Technology, Informatics, or other similar and technical areas", 'Evidence of self-motivation to continuously develop in the areas of cybersecurity', 'Good organizational and time management skills with the ability to prioritize and complete multiple complex projects under tight deadlines', 'Ability to translate security issues into business risks', 'Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within a team at all hierarchical levels', 'Willingness to research client inquiries and emerging issues, including regulations, industry practices, and new technologies', 'Experience, knowledge and strong interest in information and cyber security domains are essential for this role', 'Experience on Data privacy, implementation of data protection and privacy programmes to ensure confidentiality and security of personal data, addressing regulatory requirements', 'Experience on IT Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC), IT risk assessments & management methodologies', 'Experience on assessing, designing and implementing security strategies, governance frameworks over processes and controls, allowing organisations to optimally manage cyber security', 'Experience on design and implementation of security policies, procedures, standards and controls in line with regulation and/or current standards, such as ISO27001, NIST, SANS etc.', 'Performing Business Impact Analysis (BIA) and Information Security Risk Assessments', 'Experience on resilience, design and implementation of programmes to improve IT Disaster Recovery, Business Continuity and Crisis Management', 'Experience in data classification exercises and controls / mechanisms enforcement', 'Working knowledge of control frameworks such as ISO 27001/27002, COBIT, NIST, ITIL, etc.', 'Security-related qualifications / certifications such as CISSP, SSCP, CISM, ISO27001 lead implementer or auditor, CompTIA Security+, CIPM, CIPT, DPO Executive are desirable', 'Experience in Third Party Risk Management (TPRM) and / or vendor risk assessment engagements', 'Experience in Operational Risk Management (ORM) and Enterprise Risk Management (ERM)', 'Experience in execution of Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIA), development of Register of Processing Activities (RoPAs)', 'Experience in design and implementation of Information Security Management Systems (i.e. security policies, procedures and guidelines) according to leading International Standards', 'Security-related vendor / technology certifications are desirable', 'Project and programme management related qualifications such as Prince II, Scrum, Agile are desirable', 'Excellent interpersonal communication and organizational skills and the ability to work within tight timeframes.', 'Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.', 'Desire to investigate and try-out new tools and technologies as they are released.', 'Ability to work under tight timelines, in cases for multiple project deliveries.', 'Good interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within high-performing teams.', 'Confidence to convey technical advice and guidance to clients.', "Developing your professional growth:
You'll have unlimited access to educational platforms, EY Badges and EY Degrees, alongside support for certifications. You will experience personalized coaching and feedback, and gain exposure to international projects, through our expansive global network, empowering you to define and achieve your own success.
Dive into our innovative GenAI ecosystem, designed to enhance your EY journey and support your career growth. These advanced AI tools will empower you to focus on higher-value work and meaningful interactions, enriching your professional experience like never before.", "You'll have unlimited access to educational platforms, EY Badges and EY Degrees, alongside support for certifications. You will experience personalized coaching and feedback, and gain exposure to international projects, through our expansive global network, empowering you to define and achieve your own success.", 'Dive into our innovative GenAI ecosystem, designed to enhance your EY journey and support your career growth. These advanced AI tools will empower you to focus on higher-value work and meaningful interactions, enriching your professional experience like never before.', "Empowering your personal fulfilment: We focus on your financial, social, mental and physical wellbeing.
Our competitive rewards package, depending on your experience, includes cutting-edge technological equipment, ticket restaurant vouchers, a private health and life insurance scheme, income protection and an exclusive EY benefits club card that provides a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions.
Our flexible working arrangement (hybrid model) is defined based on your own preferences and team's needs, and we enjoy other initiatives such as summer short Fridays and an EY Day Off.
Our commitment to a sustainable way of operating, encourages volunteerism, promotes sustainable practices and offers opportunities for you to create a positive societal impact.
Our pride lies in working at EY as one of the most recognized employers in Greece through our multiple awards received over the last 3 years (Top Employer, Great Place to Work and Best Workplace in Professional Services & Consulting).", 'Our competitive rewards package, depending on your experience, includes cutting-edge technological equipment, ticket restaurant vouchers, a private health and life insurance scheme, income protection and an exclusive EY benefits club card that provides a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions.', "Our flexible working arrangement (hybrid model) is defined based on your own preferences and team's needs, and we enjoy other initiatives such as summer short Fridays and an EY Day Off.", 'Our commitment to a sustainable way of operating, encourages volunteerism, promotes sustainable practices and offers opportunities for you to create a positive societal impact.', 'Our pride lies in working at EY as one of the most recognized employers in Greece through our multiple awards received over the last 3 years (Top Employer, Great Place to Work and Best Workplace in Professional Services & Consulting).', "Fueling an inclusive culture: We prioritize a diverse, equitable and inclusive environment, where you'll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs."]

(active/in-active) each time and ensure the proper access rights based on their role.', 'Communication with affiliates with regards to system customization requirements and other issues emerging with regards to database and client needs.', 'Upload and review of KPIs and statistics to relevant system, as required.', 'Preparing monthly operational and custom reports.', 'Collaborating with third party programmers, engineers, and organizational leaders to identify opportunities for process improvements, recommend system modifications, and develop policies for data governance.', 'Maintain UpToDate documentation of work flows, processes and KPIs.', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications', 'Desired Bachelor in IT or Statistics or Maths.', 'Previous experience as Database Administrator Systems/Software, preferably in facility management at factory or technical operations.', 'Ability to quickly create and deploy patches as required in all FMS users.', 'Ability to quickly performance bottlenecks and tune the performance as required.', 'Ability to handle a variety of people and communicate effectively.', 'Experience in Data Management Tool (DMT), Integration Objects, Classifications.', 'Ability to quickly learn and trained via video.', 'Skills', 'Skills', 'Able to manage complex technical projects with diverse stakeholders and detailed, interdependent requirements.', 'Highly organized, detail oriented, independent, and resourceful.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills English and Greek.', 'Able to clearly communicate with leadership and colleagues about technical capabilities, limitations, issues, and recommendations.', 'Client Relationship management.', 'Good knowledge of database languages such as SQL will be consider an asset.', 'Good knowledge of Microsoft Suite (excel forms etc) or Google Sheets.', 'Good knowledge of data visualization software such as Tableau or Qlikview and Microsoft Bl Tools.', 'Mathematical and statistical skills are also valuable to help gather, measure, organize, and analyze data.']

['In Olympic Brewery, part of the Carlsberg Group who is one of the leading brewery groups in the world, our greatest asset is our People!', 'Olympic Brewery', 'Our People in every position, role and corner of Greece, represent the source of inspiration that drives us forward and helps us consolidate our strong position in the brewing industry and live our daily purpose, to Brew for a better today and tomorrow!', 'People', 'Brew for a better today and tomorrow!', 'Demonstrating commitment to our Diversity & Inclusion Policy we are an employer who recognizes that employee diversity is found in any social identity, and we aspire to provide recognition and development for all employees. Therefore, we want to attract and develop talented people with a global mindset, cultural understanding, and international experience, while striving to provide a working environment which amplifies diversity and inclusion.', 'During this period, we seek to recruit a professional for the following position:', 'Master Data Specialist (3 months conract)', 'Master Data Specialist (3 months conract)', 'for our Finance Department', 'based in our headquarters in Kifisia', 'As a Master Data Specialist reporting directly to theFinance Operation Manager, your mission is create and maintain the Master Data, that are fundamental to business process, in SAP system.', 'Master Data Specialist', 'What you will be doing:', 'What you will be doing:', 'Maintain master Data (vendor, material, customer etc)', 'Clean up Master Data processes', 'Create new vendor, customer, material, etc.', 'Establish Master Data processes', 'Participate in internal & external audits', 'Perform house keeping activities', 'What we are looking for', 'What we are looking for', 'BSc in Business Administration, or related field', '2 years of professional experience in relevant role  (SAP Master Data)', 'Very good knowledge of Excel and SAP S4/HANA', 'Fluency in Greek and English, both written & oral', 'Developed communication skills, both writen &oral', 'Drive, attention to detail & result orientation', 'Ability to work both independently and as part of a team as well', 'Flexibility & business acumen', 'What you can expect from us', 'What you can expect from us', 'We foster an open communication and feedback culture in order to deal with our daily challenges. In addition to this, we also offer:', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Continuous learning & training', 'Opportunities for growth & development', 'Flexible workig model', 'Are you interested in becoming a dynamic member of our Finnce Team?', 'We will expect your application till 06/06/2025.', '06/06/2025', 'All applications will remain confidential.']

role: Business Intelligence and Data Analyst (Atrium Platinum)-Rhodes
details: ['Job Description:', 'Job Description:', "Responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data to provide actionable insights that support data-driven decision-making. This role will focus on various aspects of the hotel's operations, including revenue optimization, and operational efficiency.", 'Applicantâ€™s main accountabilities:', 'Applicantâ€™s main accountabilities:', 'Collect and compile data from various sources (property management systems, reservations Platforms, financial reports) to create meaningful reports.', 'Develop and maintain regular performance reports on key metrics (occupancy rates, average daily rate, and revenue per available room).', 'Monitor and analyze market trends, competitive landscape and pricing strategies of other hotels in Rhodes.', 'Assist in the creation of budgets and financial forecasts.', 'Provide insights into revenue and cost projections for the hotelâ€™s financial planning.', 'Ensure data privacy and security protocols are followed in data handing and reporting.', 'Applicantâ€™s main qualifications:', 'Applicantâ€™s main qualifications:', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Data science or relevant field.", 'Masterâ€™s degree or equivalent in Data science, Economics or relevant field would be considered as extra asset.', 'Proficiency in data analytics and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI).', 'Knowledge of hotel management systems and databases.', 'Minimum 2 yearsâ€™ related experience in similar role.', 'Fluency in English; knowledge of other languages is a plus (preferably German).', 'Applicantâ€™s main capabilities & values:', 'Applicantâ€™s main', 'capabilities & values', ':', 'Integrity and confidentiality.', 'Excellent organizational skills.', 'Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities.', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills.', 'Attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy.', 'Company information and benefits:', 'Company information and benefits:', 'The company offers a competitive remuneration package in a dynamic and highly professional working environment. Accommodation, meals and recreational facilities are also provided.', 'Furthermore, educational lectures and personalized training plans are conducted in order to meet employee needs.', 'Finally, a merit-based performance appraisal system is implemented, and a cash bonus is provided per month based on employee performance.']
tags: ['data analyst', 'rhodes', '#bi', 'business intelligence (bi) developer']

details:
["Do you want to make an impact on patient health around the world? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment that brings together scientific, clinical and commercial domains through data engineering, data science, analytics and AI? Then join Pfizer Digital's Artificial Intelligence, Data, and Analytics organization (AIDA) where you can leverage cutting-edge technology to inform critical business decisions and improve customer experiences for our patients and physicians. Our collection of data engineering, data science, analytics and AI professionals are at the forefront of Pfizer's transformation into a digitally driven organization leveraging data science and advanced analytics to change patients' lives. The Commercial Domain Delivery team support the Pfizer Commercial Organization as the AIDA experts in data & AI strategy, product design, development, & delivery.

As a Senior Manager, Commercial Data Products, your role is to act as a trusted advisor for the US & International commercial stakeholders and identify scalable Commercial data products to solve key business questions.

You will be responsible for managing the development and deployment of Commercial data products at scale and be the digital owner of the end-to-end product roadmap.

You are expected to work closely with the Digital creation centers, AIDA Commercial COEs, Data Science Industrialization & Data engineering teams and Global commercial Analytics to bring the power of AI, Data and analytics to support key strategic priorities for the commercial organization.

As the single point of contact for you will act as domain expert for commercial stakeholders and are expected to act as an orchestrator to drive success in delivery and adoption of these products.", 'ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Product manager for assigned Commercial data products', 'Process owners for scaling, enhancement and industrialization of Commercial data products', 'Lead product roadmap creation, development & deployment for key strategic Commercial data products', 'Provide digital interface and support for enterprise transformation initiatives supported by Commercial data products', 'Partner with CMO-Commercial analytics and act as key interface with Digital/AIDA creation centers & CoEs', 'Orchestrate delivery for key AIDA priorities through partnership with Global Commercial Analytics including the Analytics Gateway', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', "Bachelor's degree in analytics related area (Data Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related discipline)", '7+ years of work experience in healthcare/life sciences consulting, analytics or product management in a diverse range of projects', "2+ years' experience in application of Data/AI/ML in pharma/healthcare commercial organizations", 'Experience of working in complex cross-functional environment with senior stakeholders in the pharma commercial domain with very strong communication and ability to influence without authority', 'Experience of working in an ambiguous environment and strong problem-solving ability using quantitative approaches', 'Strong English communication skills (written & verbal)', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Advanced degree in Data Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems or related discipline', 'Hand-on experience in at least one data/analytics engineering /data science language/platforms/technology (SQL, Python, R, SAS, Alteryx, Dataiku)', 'Hand-on experience in developing data or AI/ML products for pharma commercial applications', 'Product management background in healthcare analytics/technology', 'Understanding of pharma commercial data landscape', 'Work Location Assignment: Hybrid', 'Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.', 'To apply please visit our website www.pfizercareers.com and search job Senior Manager, Commercial Data Products id 4932967.', 'Please apply by sending your CV and a motivational letter in English.']
tags: ['commercial data', 'data science, computer engineering, computer science, information systems, engineering', 'analytics', 'data/ai/ml in pharma/healthcare', 'sql, python, r, sas, alteryx, dataiku']

details: ['As a Database Engineer you will:', 'Design and develop database, ensuring optimal performance, security, and scalability.', 'Maintain and enhance existing databases to improve performance, upgrade interfaces, and integrate new features.', 'Collaborate with application developers to integrate databases with existing applications and support application development.', 'Write well-designed, testable, efficient database scripts, stored procedures, and functions.', 'Provide support by troubleshooting and resolving database issues.', 'Document database schemas and development processes.', 'Stay informed of new technologies and best practices in database development.', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.", 'Proven work experience as a Database Developer or similar role with at least 2 years experience.', 'Strong understanding of SQL and experience with database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle.', 'Experience with database design, documentation, and coding.', 'Familiarity with software development methodologies and the software development lifecycle.', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'The opportunity to work in a modern environment & in a hybrid working model', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal and commuting allowance', 'Well-being activities (on premises)', 'Continuous learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings)', 'A personalized development plan for targeted career growth', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. details: ['Volton Hellenic Energy SA is a Greek company that is dynamically active and is rapidly increasing its capacity in the field of Electricity Supply and Trading, in the Gas Energy Sector and in the field of Telecommunications (through Orizon).', 'Volton', "By offering reliable services that meet the ever-growing energy needs of businesses and households, Volton aims to build solid and trustful relationships with its customers. The company's ambition is to become one of the most important companies in the industry and remain at the forefront of developments as the first multiservice provider combining Electricity, Natural Gas and Telecommunications.", ', Volton', 'As part of its development Volton strengthens its human resources in Athens and seeks a Product Manager (Energy).', 'Volton', 'Athens', 'Product Manager (Energy).', 'The Product Manager plays a critical role in driving the development and optimization of Voltonâ€™s energy product portfolio, encompassing electricity and natural gas. This role aligns with our mission to deliver innovative, sustainable, and customer-focused energy solutions, ensuring Volton remains a leader in the electrical energy supply industry. By blending strategic vision with hands-on execution, the Product Manager contributes to achieving business growth and customer satisfaction.', 'Product Manager', 'Voltonâ€™s', 'Volton', 'Product Manager', 'Oversee the full lifecycle of energy products, from conceptualization and design to implementation and market introduction', 'Develop strategies for product enhancements based on customer feedback, competitive analysis, and market trends', 'Conduct periodic SWOT analysis to inform strategic decisions', 'Analyze market situation, trends, regulatory developments, and competitor offerings to identify opportunities for innovation and differentiation', 'Deploy go-to-market strategies and tactics within agreed timelines and budgets', 'Cooperate cross-functionally with Legal, Sales, MarCom, Operations, CX, Customer Care and Technical teams for successful product launches', 'Collaborate with external partners and vendors to support product development initiatives', 'Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success, such as market share, revenue growth, and customer satisfaction', 'Responsible for P&L and financial analysis for the assigned portfolio', 'Increase customer retention rates through product innovations and contribute to the achievement of annual revenue and growth targets', 'Prepare detailed reports and presentations for senior leadership on product performance and future initiatives', 'Act as an ambassador of the products within the organization', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field; A Masterâ€™s degree will be a plus', '5 years of experience in product management, experience within the energy sector will be strongly appreciated', 'Certifications in Product Management are a plus', 'Solid understanding of energy markets, particularly electricity and natural gas', 'Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau) and project management software (e.g. Jira)', 'Strong leadership and team management capabilities', 'Excellent communication skills to convey complex concepts to diverse audiences', 'Critical thinking and problem-solving abilities', 'Customer-centric approach with a focus on delivering value', 'Innovative mindset to drive product differentiation', 'Strong organizational skills with attention to detail', 'A competitive fixed salary package aligned with your experience and expectations', 'Hybrid working model', 'Private insurance, corporate benefits and perks', 'Continuous training and professional development', 'Excellent professional environment', 'Modern and productive working facilities', 'Donâ€™t miss the chance to join a Great Place to Work-Certified Company that fosters a positive work environment, proudly recognized as a Best Workplace for Women 2025.', 'Great Place to Work-Certified Company', 'Best Workplace for Women 2025', 'All applications will be treated with confidentiality. If your CV meets the requirements of the job, we will contact you by phone to schedule an appointment. Information about the company on our site volton.gr', 'volton.gr']
tags: ['reporting', 'data analysis', 'product marketing', 'product manager', 'product manager, product management, category management, marketing', 'energy']

details: ['KLEVA Pharmaceuticals S.A. is a privately owned pharmaceutical and fully integrated company that has been in operation in Greece for over 50 years. Kleva develops and manufactures generic products and focuses on Pharmaceuticals (Rx & OTC).', 'Our two manufacturing facilities in the North of Athens, Greece, are equipped with high technology machinery and have the manufacturing potential for a wide range of pharmaceutical forms.', 'Our mission is to offer a flexible, fully scalable, qualitative, and cost-effective product development in a wide range of dosage forms. We register and export our products to a number of regulated and non-regulated markets around the world.', 'To realize our ambitious goals, KLEVA needs people who are innovators, believe in the values of respect and cooperation and are ready to commit to a company that wants to penetrate new markets, leverage international business development opportunities, and enter contract manufacturing deals.', 'How you will support our mission', 'We are looking for a Quality Control Analyst.', 'Quality Control Analyst.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Ensure that lab cleanliness and safety standards are maintained. Develop and qualify new testing methods.', 'Train other analysts to perform laboratory procedures and assays. Participate in internal and external audits as required.', 'Identify and troubleshoot equipment problems.', 'Evaluate new technologies and methods to make recommendations regarding their use.', 'Serve as a technical liaison between quality control and other departments, vendors, or contractors. Write technical reports or documentation such as deviation reports, testing protocols, and trend analyses. Write or revise standard quality control operating procedures.', 'Supply quality control data necessary for regulatory submissions. Receive and inspect raw materials.', 'Review data from contract laboratories to ensure accuracy and regulatory compliance.', 'Prepare or review required method transfer documentation including technical transfer protocols or reports. Perform validations or transfers of analytical methods in accordance with applicable policies or guidelines. Participate in out-of-specification and failure investigations and recommend corrective actions.', 'Interpret test results, compare them to established specifications and control limits, and make recommendations on appropriateness of data for release.', 'Identify quality problems and recommend solutions.', 'Evaluate analytical methods and procedures to determine how they might be improved.', 'Complete documentation needed to support testing procedures including data capture forms, equipment logbooks, or inventory forms.', 'Calibrate, validate, or maintain laboratory equipment.', 'Compile laboratory test data and perform appropriate analyses.', 'Conduct routine and non-routine analyses of in-process materials, raw materials, environmental samples, finished goods, or stability samples.', 'Requirements:', 'Requirements:', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree (Chemistry)', 'Postgraduate degree is desirable', '1+ year of related pharmaceutical laboratory experience in a cGMP environment', 'Prior experience in method development/validation and/or transfer/verification, protocols, and troubleshooting', 'Fluency in English language written and oral.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Work in a friendly and challenging environment', 'Competitive salary', 'Private insurance', 'Personal development opportunities']
tags: ['pharmaceutical quality control analyst', 'quality control', 'pharmaceutical company', 'pharmaceutical industry', 'analyze data']

details: ['Volton Hellenic Energy SA is a Greek company that is dynamically active and is rapidly increasing its capacity in the field of Electricity Supply and Trading, in the Gas Energy Sector and in the field of Telecommunications (through Orizon).', 'Volton', "By offering reliable services that meet the ever-growing energy needs of businesses and households, Volton aims to build solid and trustful relationships with its customers. The company's ambition is to become one of the most important companies in the industry and remain at the forefront of developments as the first multiservice provider combining Electricity, Natural Gas and Telecommunications.", ', Volton', 'As part of its development Volton strengthens its human resources in Athens and seeks a CVM Analyst for our Energy and Telecoms Sector.', 'Volton', 'Athens', 'CVM Analyst for our Energy and Telecoms Sector', 'Responsibilities', 'Deep understanding of customerâ€™s needs in order to develop successful propositions', 'Design, implement, and evaluate A/B testing initiatives across a range of CVM campaigns and customer communication channels to maximize engagement & ROI', 'Monitor, analyze and make recommendations on CVM initiatives', 'Monitor key metrics related to churn rate, customer retention, and lifetime value to track the effectiveness of retention efforts. Analyze trends over time and iterate on strategies to continuously improve retention outcomes', 'Anticipate and mitigate potential risks that may contribute to churn, such as competitive threats, market shifts, or changes in customer needs', 'Build predictive models to forecast churn probability for individual customers or segments', 'Ensure data quality and consistency to make accurate and reliable analyses.', 'Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics relevant to the business objectives', 'Create visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights and findings to details: ['We are looking for a dynamic and self-driven Junior Risk Engineer to join our growing team. From this role, you will be responsible to provide support to the underwriting team by evaluating new and existing risks.', 'Junior Risk Engineer', 'Role responsibilities', 'Role responsibilities', 'Review and analyse technical data â€“ Desk risk analysis and evaluation', 'Contact risk surveys on site, providing risk engineering, technical consultation, and proposing loss prevention and control-oriented improvements', 'Cooperate with relevant parties to provide advisory service and assisting the whole process of new and existing businesses', 'Ensure delivery of advisory services in compliance with regulations and internal procedures', 'Support and contribute to Underwriting team projects', 'Support the culture of the business; identify and demonstrate the behaviours and actions that encourage the companyâ€™s values', 'Knowledge, Skills & Experience', 'Knowledge, Skills & Experience', 'BSc in Engineering (Mechanical, Chemical)', '1 - 2 years of proven industry experience within energy, engineering and/or industrial sectors.', 'Strong and communication skills (both verbal and written)', 'Effective analytical skills', 'Attention to detail', 'Ability to operate effectively under pressure', 'Results orientated', 'Motivation for continuous improvement and development', 'Excellent command of the English Language', 'Proficient in the use of MS Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook)', 'What we offer', 'What we offer', 'In Eurolife FFH we believe in the power of people becoming the best version of themselves. details: ['Based in Athens, Greece this person will be responsible and/or contribute to quality control, issue support, change event management, and other specialized delivery processes in support of Retail clients. This person will work individually and in concert with United States Client Service employees and Capgemini employees in Bogota to deliver on-time and quality deliverables.', 'The primary responsibility of this position is to manage the Ticketing System for one of Circanaâ€™s largest retail clients. Tickets are created by vendors that subscribe to our models/databases, as well as internal partners.\nQuestions reside in the areas of Access, Item Placement, Reporting, Data Integrity, and Other (training, adhoc, etc.)', 'Questions reside in the areas of Access, Item Placement, Reporting, Data Integrity, and Other (training, adhoc, etc.)', 'Resolve data and reporting questions submitted by vendors and internal partners.', 'Proactively communicate issues or concerns. Chosen candidates must be able to expertly communicate written English.', 'Chosen candidates must be able to expertly communicate written English.', 'Develop trusted relationships with Retail Client Service teams and supporting organizations such as modeling, issue support, and technology operations and other support groups to ensure ultimate resolution and closure of issues and change events.', 'Be responsible and own Retail processes, quality control, and timeliness of Retail deliverables.', 'Attend and contribute to the daily management system which is a continuous process improvement initiative to achieve operational excellence.', 'Solve issues, problems, or discuss processes and opportunities either independently or amongst a team/group setting.', '1-3 years of experience in the retailer and/or consumer data field', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree required', 'Strong capabilities to work daily in English (spoken and written)', 'Proficiency in Excel (pivot tables, v-look up and basic calculations). Advanced Excel skills strongly preferred', 'Ability to resolve data integrity issues using basic mathematical components of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.', 'Ability to partner with internal teams, monitor workflow, and assure follow-through. Ability to partner cross functionally is critical as the account team is rather large.', 'Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and to coordinate multi-disciplinary teams', 'At Circana, we are fueled by our passion for continuous learning and growth, we seek and share feedback freely, and we celebrate victories both big and small in an environment that is flexible and accommodating to our work and personal lives. We have a global commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion as we believe in the undeniable strength that diversity brings to our business, employees, clients, and communities. With us, you can always bring your full self to work. Join our inclusive, committed team to be a challenger, own outcomes, and stay curious together. Circana is proud to be Certifiedâ„¢ by Great Place To WorkÂ®. This prestigious award is based entirely on what current employees say about their experience working at Circana.']

details: ['About Aambience Services', 'About Aambience Services', 'Aambience Services is an innovative company, providing Business Process Outsourcing, IT and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Services. What makes us different, is our strong desire to challenge the status quo, inspire and create ground-breaking solutions. We build relationships of trust with our clients, on solid foundations of quality and know-how, while creating great experiences, through great customer service.', 'Our team consists of experienced professionals with a passion for their work. They are the cornerstone of our companyâ€™s dynamic culture and stand as strong and reliable partners towards our customersâ€™ concerns and needs. Therefore, we have built a diverse environment that maximizes employee engagement and performance, based on our key value to invest on and develop our people and teams.', 'The Role', 'The Role', "We are looking for a self-motivated and detail-oriented Accountant to join our dynamic team in Athens. In this role, you will support the finance department by completing various accounting tasks, including maintaining financial records and preparing reports. You will also work closely with other departments to ensure that financial activities align with the company's goals and objectives.", 'Accountant', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Assist the finance department in managing day-to-day accounting transactions, including accounts payable and accounts receivable', 'Manage the daily operations of the accounting department and the general accounting functions', 'Monitor daily cash balances, prepare cash flow projections, and assist in preparing bank reconciliations', 'Perform general ledger account reconciliations and ensure the accuracy of accounting records', 'Assist in month-end and year-end closing procedures, including preparing journal entries and financial statements', 'Support the finance team in developing and implementing accounting policies and procedures', 'Participate in the preparation & timely submission of monthly, quarterly, and annual tax declarations', 'Assist with tax audits and tax returns', 'Prepare ad-hoc reports and analysis as needed to support business decisions', 'Prepare other ad hoc analysis/reports as per management requirements', 'Requirements', 'BSc in Accounting, Finance, Economics', 'Proven experience (at least 5 years) in an accounting role, with a focus on general ledger accounting', 'Experience in ERP Systems (Knowledge of Entersoft will be highly appreciated)', 'Proficient in MS Office, particularly in Excel', 'Highly detail-oriented and organized, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills', 'Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment', 'Benefits', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Private medical insurance', 'Continuous training and development of your skills', 'A place where your professional and personal success is our commitment']

details: ['Welcome to Orizon Global', 'Welcome to Orizon Global', 'Orizon Global is a group of companies, compromising of businesses providing 360-degree property management services, interior design consultancy, real estate brokerage, property rentals, and engage in the trade of collectible design, decoration, lighting and furniture. We stand as a dynamic project management team. We work as one organization to offer our clients a turnkey solution and an equal quality of service. The group is structured as a matrix that enables all our activities to utilize a centralized pool of specialized skills and know-how. Our primary focus on high-end residential, extends to the Greek islands and the Attica region.', 'Our Distinctive Culture:', 'Our Distinctive Culture:', 'Our team consists of young and ambitious professionals, each bringing a unique perspective from diverse international backgrounds. Committed to both personal and collective growth within our organization, we cultivate a culture of continuous improvement. This culture thrives on open communication, the exchange of prosperous feedback, and a foundation of mutual respect among our team members.', 'Role Description: Accounting Administrator', 'Role Description:', 'Location: Kolonaki, Athens (Full-time, On-site)', 'Location:', 'We are looking for a meticulous junior Accountant to join forces and assist us with our accounting processes with precision and integrity. Based in Kolonaki, Athens, this full-time role is ideal for a detail-oriented professional with a passion for problem-solving and bookkeeping. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the stability and growth of a fast-evolving commercial business.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Monthly Bookkeeping: collecting, entering and archiving supplier invoices/bills', 'Utility Bills Management of our properties', 'Insurance Contracts deadlines monitoring of our properties and businesses', 'Customers & Suppliers: monitoring and updating balances', 'Treasury: executing and recording payments, ensuring collection of all the payment-related invoices/receipts', 'Banking: collecting bank statements and reconciling bank accounts', 'Payroll entries', 'End-of-month activities: assisting with various tasks and responsibilities', 'Qualifications:', 'Qualifications:', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Accounting', 'Good Microsoft Excel & Word user & generally very comfortable with IT tools', 'Professional-level user of English language', 'Strong attention to detail, well organized', 'Meeting deadlines', 'Knowledge of using SoftOne would be considered a big plus', 'Why Join Us:', 'Why Join Us:', 'At Orizon Global, we value proactive individuals who contribute to a positive and thriving work environment. As our Accounting Administrator, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the smooth operation of our Finance department, while having the opportunity to engage in diverse tasks that contribute to the overall success of our projects. Additionally, by providing accurate data, you will play a fundamental role in our decision-making process. details: ['What will you be doing?', 'Everyday routine of the successful candidate will include:', 'Dealing with very big datasets (TBs) with hundreds of columns, stored in Hadoop clusters', 'Due to huge amount of available data, Circana will provide special training to handle big data using spark and Hadoop clusters.', 'A mix of programming languages (Python, R, Julia etc.)', 'Interaction with highly skilled engineers and business people with different disciplines distributed around the globe', 'A mix of relational databases', 'A fast paced Agile/Scrum development environment', 'Very demanding customers from the US retail sector', 'Statistical modeling on huge amount of data. Implementation of complex statistical and machine learning algorithms', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Participation in the delivery of analytics projects, providing supervision to more junior members of the team and enforcing best practice and quality standards', 'Design of new features and major enhancements', 'Performing thorough code reviews of all code and repair legacy code', 'Being accountable for the performance and reliability of all product/component(s)', 'Ensuring that all code is well-written, well-documented, and well-tested', 'Building and retaining excellent working relationships', 'Acting proactively in flagging potential critical issues and challenges of the project to his/her manager', 'Requirements', 'MSc /PhD university degree in IT/ Computer Science, Statistics/ Mathematics or any other relevant field', 'Fluent in Python both functional and object oriented', 'Data manipulation experience e.g. Numpy and Pandas', 'Experience in relational databases and SQL', 'At least 3 years of working experience within a development team. Excellent git knowledge', 'Expertise in PySpark is a plus', 'High command of verbal and written English', 'Circana Behaviors', 'As well as the technical skills, experience and attributes that are required for the role, our shared behaviors sit at the core of our organization. Therefore, we always look for people who can continuously champion these behaviors throughout the business within their day-to-day role:', 'Stay Curious: Being hungry to learn and grow, always asking the big questions.', 'Seek Clarity: Embracing complexity to create clarity and inspire action.', 'Own the Outcome: Being accountable for decisions and taking ownership of our choices.', 'Center on the Client: Relentlessly adding value for our customers.', 'Be a Challenger: Never complacent, always striving for continuous improvement.', 'Champion Inclusivity: Fostering trust in relationships engaging with empathy, respect, and integrity.', 'Commit to each other: Contributing to making Circana a great place to work for everyone.']
tags: ['data science', 'analytics', 'research', 'mathematics, statistics, computer science, software engineering', 'data analysis, machine learning, statistics']
