details: ['Client Service Specialist', 'Letâ€™s be unstoppable together!', 'At Circana, we are fueled by our passion for continuous learning and growth, we seek and share feedback freely, and we celebrate victories both big and small in an environment that is flexible and accommodating to our work and personal lives. We have a global commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion as we believe in the undeniable strength that diversity brings to our business, employees, clients, and communities (with us you can always bring your full self to work).Join our inclusive, committed team to be a challenger, own outcomes, and stay curious together.', 'What will you be doing?', 'The Client Service Specialist is responsible for providing our clients with an excellent customer service experience. The role entails understanding and analysing FMCG Market evolutions for creating insightful reports, both periodical and ad hoc, that drive actionable insights.', 'Job Responsibilities', 'Client satisfaction is at the epicentre in Circana and the Client Service Specialist needs to handle all client queries in a timely manner to point of resolution and coordinate, where appropriate, all cross-functional working to support the resolving of issues or challenges.', 'Flawless planning, proactive communication, quality, and timeliness are essential to ensure the high level of client satisfaction.', 'This role will provide lots of opportunities to gain the commercial awareness, industry knowledge, technical skills, and professional experience to grow within the business.', 'Requirements:', 'University Degree preferably in Business Administration, Marketing & Marketing Research, or related subject', 'Proficient use of MS Excel and MS PowerPoint. Experience in working with BI tools (Unify, Power BI, Tableau) is considered a plus', 'Good communication skills (both oral and written) in Greek and English Language (German, Italian, French, Dutch, Spanish a plus)', 'Creativity and resourcefulness', 'Ability to work under high pressure and meet tight deadlines', 'Be collaborative in a Team environment', 'Effective time management, to coordinate between different projects, ensuring on-time and correct delivery', 'Curiosity, creativity, and passion for a stellar client experience (C-X)', 'Circana Behaviors', 'As well as the technical skills, experience and attributes that are required for the role, our shared behaviors sit at the core of our organization. Therefore, we always look for people who can continuously champion these behaviors throughout the business within their day-to-day role:', 'Stay Curious: Being hungry to learn and grow, always asking the big questions.', 'Seek Clarity: Embracing complexity to create clarity and inspire action.', 'Own the Outcome: Being accountable for decisions and taking ownership of our choices.', 'Center on the Client: Relentlessly adding value for our customers.', 'Be a Challenger: Never complacent, always striving for continuous improvement.', 'Champion Inclusivity: Fostering trust in relationships engaging with empathy, respect, and integrity.', 'Commit to each other: Contributing to making Circana a great place to work for everyone.']
tags: ['data analysis', 'business', 'data sciences', 'retailer', 'client service']

details: ['Electra Hotels & Resorts,', 'Electra Hotels & Resorts,', 'is actively looking to recruit a Revenue Executive (Fixed Term Contract) (Position Ref.: REVEXFT)', 'Revenue Executive (Fixed Term Contract)', 'This position will be reporting to the Revenue Manager.', 'Main Responsibilities:', 'Main', 'Responsibilities:', 'Be the owner of new Channel Connections (Room and Rate Plan Mapping, Accurate Availability distribution) on the Channel Manager', 'Support inventory management and pricing through all channels on a daily basis', 'Assist the DORM with essential administrative duties and fulfill reporting and analysis tasks', 'Closely monitor competitive pricing and understand the impact of pricing decisions on property performance; perform competitor checks and report as appropriate', 'Support the DORM in the effective implementation of Standards, Policies & Procedures (Rate Plans, Rate Categories, Market Segmentation, Profiles, and all other PMS and Channel Manager RM-related functionalities)', 'Action rate solicitations as directed and maintain rate plans', 'Ensure the hotel is compliant with Best Rate Guarantee standards', 'Assist the DORM with balancing all figures between the PMS and Channel Manager, ensuring accurate data entry', 'Support the execution of the selling strategy through the Channel Manager and all available channels', 'Skills, Experience & Educational Requirements:', 'Skills, Experience & Educational Requirements:', 'Minimum of 2 years of experience in Revenue Management or a similar analytical role within the hospitality or service industry', 'A University Degree in Economics, Business Administration, Data Analytics, or other related fields will be considered an asset', 'Proficient in Microsoft Office applications, particularly Excel and Word', 'Familiarity with hotel systems and Property Management Systems (PMS), especially Opera', 'Prior experience with WebHotelier and/or PrimalRES will be considered an asset', 'Minimum of 2 years of experience with Channel Connectivity for Central Reservation Systems (CRS) is required', 'Fluency in both Greek and English (written and spoken)', 'Strong problem-solving abilities and a results-oriented mindset', 'Excellent organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment', 'Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to build details: ['About Aambience Services', 'About Aambience Services', 'Aambience Services is an innovative company, providing Business Process Outsourcing, IT and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Services. What makes us different, is our strong desire to challenge the status quo, inspire and create ground-breaking solutions. We build relationships of trust with our clients, on solid foundations of quality and know-how, while creating great experiences, through great customer service.', 'Our team consists of experienced professionals with a passion for their work. They are the cornerstone of our companyâ€™s dynamic culture and stand as strong and reliable partners towards our customersâ€™ concerns and needs. Therefore, we have built a diverse environment that maximizes employee engagement and performance, based on our key value to invest on and develop our people and teams.', 'The Role', 'The Role', "We are looking for a self-motivated and detail-oriented Assistant Accountant to join our dynamic team in Athens. In this role, you will support the finance department by completing various accounting tasks, including maintaining financial records and preparing reports. You will also work closely with other departments to ensure that financial activities align with the company's goals and objectives.", 'Assistant Accountant', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Assist the finance department in managing day-to-day accounting transactions, including accounts payable and accounts receivable', 'Manage the daily operations of the accounting department and the general accounting functions', 'Monitor daily cash balances, prepare cash flow projections, and assist in preparing bank reconciliations', 'Perform general ledger account reconciliations and ensure the accuracy of accounting records', 'Assist in month-end and year-end closing procedures, including preparing journal entries and financial statements', 'Support the finance team in developing and implementing accounting policies and procedures', 'Prepare ad-hoc reports and analysis as needed to support business decisions', 'Prepare other ad hoc analysis/reports as per management requirements', 'Requirements', 'BSc in Accounting, Finance, Economics', 'Proven experience (at least 4 year) in an accounting role, with a focus on general ledger accounting', 'Experience in ERP Systems (Knowledge of Atlantis will be highly appreciated)', 'Proficient in MS Office, particularly in Excel', 'Highly detail-oriented and organized, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills', 'Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment', 'Benefits', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Private medical insurance', 'Continuous training and development of your skills', 'A place where your professional and personal success is our commitment']

details: ['Company Overview', 'Company Overview', 'Sioufas & Associates Law Firm, the leading firm in its field, is currently seeking an Invoicing Employee to join its Legal Services Division at the companyâ€™s headquarters in Athens.', 'With a team of over 400 highly skilled professionals, our firm serves a prestigious portfolio of clients, including major Greek and multinational companies across various sectors of the economy. We pride ourselves on our rapid growth, professional excellence, and commitment to continuous improvement.', 'Position Summary', 'Position Summary', 'Reporting directly to the Invoicing Supervisor, the successful candidate will play a key role in the accurate and timely issuance of invoices and legal billing documentation, ensuring seamless communication between internal departments and external clients.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Preparation and issuance of service invoices and supporting legal documents', 'Creation and maintenance of Excel-based reports to support billing analysis and decision-making', 'Communication with clients and internal departments regarding billing inquiries and resolutions', 'Review and verification of legal documentation related to billing', 'Contribution to the preparation of billing schedules and electronic files for invoicing purposes', 'Requirements', 'University degree (AEI/TEI) in Accounting, Finance, or a related field', 'Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience, preferably within a corporate accounting department or a structured tax/accounting office', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office, with advanced Excel skills', 'Familiarity with ATLANTIS ERP or a similar accounting software', 'Strong analytical and organizational skills', 'Ability to work both independently and as part of a team', 'Benefits', 'Competitive compensation package', 'Opportunities for professional development and career growth', 'Comprehensive training and continuous support', 'A modern, friendly, and dynamic work environment', 'If you are a motivated professional seeking a challenging role in a fast-paced legal environment, we invite you to apply and become a part of our growing team.']

details: ['Hemmersbach provides IT infrastructure services in more than 190 countries with 50 own subsidiaries. We deliver exclusively for the leading companies in the IT industry. We go the extra mile â€“ we not only simply enthuse our customers, but also make the world a better place: 20% of our profits go into our Direct Actions Hemmersbach Rhino Force and Hemmersbach Kidsâ€™ Family. Thatâ€™s why Hemmersbach is The Social Purpose IT Company.', 'Hemmersbach', 'Role:', 'Role:', 'Ensure timely and accurate filing of VAT returns for German entities.', 'Monitor and implement changes in VAT legislation.', 'Provide guidance and support to internal teams on VAT-related matters.', 'Act as the point of contact for external auditors and tax consultants.', 'Ensure compliance with German financial and tax regulations.', 'Stay updated on legislative changes and their impact on the organization.', 'Prepare and review monthly financial statements in accordance with local accounting standards.', 'Reconcile general ledger accounts and ensure timely reporting.', 'Support strategic decision-making with expert tax advice.', 'Work with the finance team to streamline monthly closing procedures.', 'Requirements:', 'Requirements:', 'Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in German.', 'Certified Accountant (Bilanzbuchhalter) or equivalent professional qualification (Steuerfachwirt / Steuerberater).', 'Proven experience in VAT compliance and monthly financial closings, preferably for German entities.', 'Proficiency in accounting software and reporting tools (e.g., DATEV or MS Dynamics).', 'Strong knowledge of German (HGB) and tax regulations.', 'Ability to manage deadlines and work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Buddy program.', 'International environment.', 'Job with purpose.', 'Mobile working.', 'Staff discounts.', 'Unlimited employment contract.', 'Private Life and Health Insurance.', 'Joining Hemmersbach, you will support our commitment to social responsibility. We prioritize 20% of our profits into our company owned organizations such as:', 'Rhino-force.org: providing environmental protection for an endangered species', 'Kids-family.org: taking care of children without parents in Poland and India, turning their shelters into homes.']

details: ['Volton Hellenic Energy SA is a Greek company that is dynamically active and is rapidly increasing its capacity in the field of Electricity Supply and Trading, in the Gas Energy Sector and in the field of Telecommunications (through Orizon).', 'Volton Hellenic Energy SA', 'Orizon', "By offering reliable services that meet the ever-growing energy needs of businesses and households, Volton aims to build solid and trustful relationships with its customers. details: ['Inter Cars Greece Single Member Liability Company is a subsidiary of Inter Cars S.A., the biggest importer and distributor of automotive spare parts and garage equipment in Middle and Eastern Europe. With over 200 branches in Poland and more than 190 branches in Europe, Inter Cars Greece values passion and involvement, partnership, reliability, loyalty, and leadership by example.', 'Inter Cars Greece is interested in appointing a Product Specialist for the LKW Segment in the Athens Metropolitan Area. The right candidate will contribute to the team and help achieve the corporate goals.', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Analyze the market in terms of competition, product mix, pricing, market sharing facilitating advanced excel functions and skills.', 'Support the growth plan of the purchasing department.', 'Play an integral part of the team that has as a major objective to multiply the segment size.', 'Handling the cycle of supplies and equipment.', 'Develop and maintain professional relationships with all suppliers. Maintain quality of purchasing procedures.', 'Ensure compliance with all purchasing policies. Evaluate all quotes and coordinate with vendors to provide required component bids and analyze all vendor performance to improve all purchasing process.', 'Design and implement various purchasing strategies and procurement. Participate in all supplier selection and pricing reduction programs in coordination with global supply chain team. Determine appropriate programs for all purchase requirements and assist in reducing supply chain costs.', 'Provide network support, execute and check if the purchasing processes have been followed and provide an effective interface with all departments and branches. Ensure that there is an efficient ABC analysis and keep stocks of the shop under close supervision.', 'Coordinate with all internal departments in terms of priorities to ensure efficiencies, scale economies and effectiveness of the purchasing system.', 'Requirements', 'Requirements', 'BSc in Engineering, Business Administration or related field. MSc will be considered as a strong asset.', 'Advanced excel skills are essential.', 'Strong presentation, verbal and written communication skills (English and Greek).', 'Strong technical skills, analytical ability and attention to detail.', '3-5 yearsâ€™ work experience in a similar role required.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Ability to work as a team member and independently when required.', 'Office 365 strong knowledge required.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Skills development scheme', 'Career advancement in a multinational corporate environment', 'Additional private health insurance scheme', 'Due to the high volume of applications only high final candidates will be conducted. Inter Cars promotes privacy and confidentiality and aims to protect candidatesâ€™ personal data, in accordance with General Data Protection Regulation (Reg. 2016/679) requirements and national legislation.']

details: ['Company Overview', 'Company Overview', 'Sioufas & Associates Law Firm, the leading firm in its field, is currently seeking an Invoicing Employee to join its Legal Services Division at the companyâ€™s headquarters in Athens.', 'With a team of over 400 highly skilled professionals, our firm serves a prestigious portfolio of clients, including major Greek and multinational companies across various sectors of the economy. We pride ourselves on our rapid growth, professional excellence, and commitment to continuous improvement.', 'Position Summary', 'Position Summary', 'Reporting directly to the Invoicing Supervisor, the successful candidate will play a key role in the accurate and timely issuance of invoices and legal billing documentation, ensuring seamless communication between internal departments and external clients.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Preparation and issuance of service invoices and supporting legal documents', 'Creation and maintenance of Excel-based reports to support billing analysis and decision-making', 'Communication with clients and internal departments regarding billing inquiries and resolutions', 'Review and verification of legal documentation related to billing', 'Contribution to the preparation of billing schedules and electronic files for invoicing purposes', 'Requirements', 'University degree (AEI/TEI) in Accounting, Finance, or a related field', 'Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience, preferably within a corporate accounting department or a structured tax/accounting office', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office, with advanced Excel skills', 'Familiarity with ATLANTIS ERP or a similar accounting software', 'Strong analytical and organizational skills', 'Ability to work both independently and as part of a team', 'Benefits', 'Competitive compensation package', 'Opportunities for professional development and career growth', 'Comprehensive training and continuous support', 'A modern, friendly, and dynamic work environment', 'If you are a motivated professional seeking a challenging role in a fast-paced legal environment, we invite you to apply and become a part of our growing team.']

details: ["At KSM, our mission is to be the strategic HRBP for the companies we collaborate with, while contributing to the professional development and satisfaction of candidates' goals. details: ['The merger of SOFTONE and ENTERSOFT has formed the largest provider of business software products and services in Greece. This newly unified organization now boasts over 1,500 employees and an extensive network of 700+ specialized partners, effectively serving a growing customer base of 90,000+ businesses across four countries (Greece, Cyprus, Bulgaria, and Romania).', 'SOFTONE', 'ENTERSOFT', 'over 1,500 employees', '700+ specialized partners', '90,000+ businesses across four countries', 'With strong expertise, high specialization, and continuous investment in innovation, the new organization offers a comprehensive portfolio of digital solutionsâ€”ranging from ERP, CRM, HCM, and Accounting to Digital Commerce platforms, E-Invoicing services, solutions for freelancers and small businesses, ESG Reporting, E-Procurement, and industry-specific applications for retail, hospitality, and other sectors. details: ['We can offer you the following tasks and responsibilities', 'We can offer you the following tasks and responsibilities', 'Maintaining accurate records of financial transactions, including recording accounts payable and receivable, bank transactions, and invoices.', 'Managing and tracking payments to vendors and suppliers (accounts payable).', 'Ensuring timely collection of payments from clients (accounts receivable).', 'Helping with the preparation of documents and information for internal or external audits.', 'Checking, verifying, and ensuring that the companyâ€™s financial data is accurately reported to the myData platform in compliance with the Greek tax authorities\' requirements. This includes overseeing the submission of invoices, receipts, and other relevant documents in line with legal obligations."', 'You can help us with these qualifications', 'You can help us with these qualifications', 'A Bachelorâ€™s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related discipline.', '3-5 years of relevant experience is an advantage', 'Solid understanding of Greek Accounting Standards, Tax Laws, and IFRS.', 'Fluent in English, both written and spoken.', 'Exceptional attention to detail and precision.', 'Member of the Economic Chamber of Greece.', 'Advanced knowledge of MS Office applications.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills.', 'Capable of managing multiple priorities and delivering results on time.', 'Effective in intercultural communication, conflict management, and collaborative teamwork.', 'Benefits & Learning Opportunities', 'Benefits & Learning Opportunities', 'Medical & Life insurance scheme', 'Several days off for examinations, blood donation, educational leave, compassionate leave']

details: ['Sioufas & Associates Law Firm branch of Thessaloniki, a leading Greek law firm with offices in three major cities of Greece (Athens, Thessaloniki and Patras), in Romania (Bucharest) and Singapore, is currently looking for a Business Analyst who would like to join its dynamic, motivating and highly skilled team.', 'Sioufas & Associates Law Firm branch of Thessaloniki', 'Business Analyst', 'The candidate will hold a position that focuses on data analytics and includes the following responsibilities:', 'Analyze data to identify trends, insights, and areas of improvement.', 'Create detailed reports and dashboards to track key sales metrics (revenue, conversion rates, pipeline health, etc.) using Excel, Qlik and PowerBI.', 'Develop and automate data-driven forecasts and models using Python.', 'Collaborate with production to deliver actionable insights that help optimize the operational process.', 'Work with large datasets, employing SQL for querying data from our data warehouse.', 'Identify opportunities to streamline and improve cashflow, operations and reporting processes.', 'Requirements', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Economics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.', 'MSc in relevant area of expertise will be considered an asset', '3-5 years of experience in a similar position', 'Fluent English speaker', 'Knowledge of and experience with reporting packages', 'Strong knowledge of Excel (advanced skills, including PivotTables, complex formulas; VBA is a plus).', 'Basic experience working with Qlik or PowerBI to develop visualizations and reports.', 'Hands-on experience with SQL.', 'Strong analytical skills with the ability to turn raw data into actionable insights.', 'Excellent communication skills for presenting findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Hands on, results driven, can-do attitude', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Experience with sales analytics, revenue forecasting, or sales operations.', 'Basic knowledge of Python for data analysis.', 'Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.', 'Exposure to CRM systems is a plus.', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary and benefits package', 'Opportunities for professional growth and development.', 'A collaborative and innovative working environment.']
tags: ['businessanalyst', 'financialanalysis', 'dataanalysis']

details: ['About Us', 'About Us', 'Sioufas & Associates Law Firm is a leading Greek law firm with a strong presence in Athens, Thessaloniki, Patras, and Bucharest, Romania. We are committed to delivering exceptional legal services and fostering a dynamic, inclusive, and high-performing work environment.', 'Position Overview', 'Position Overview', 'As a Full Stack Developer, you will play a key role in enhancing and expanding our software applications while ensuring the efficiency of the SDLC. As a key member of our Legal Services Department, you will collaborate closely with the Business Analyst team to design, develop, and implement scalable applications that align with business needs.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Design, develop, and maintain robust front-end and back-end applications.', 'Develop new user-facing features using Angular and React.', 'Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.', 'Translate UI/UX designs and wireframes into high-quality, responsive code.', 'Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.', 'Collaborate with UI/UX designers and back-end developers to improve usability and performance.', 'Develop and maintain back-end services using Python.', 'Implement and manage RESTful APIs for seamless integration.', 'Write complex SQL queries while ensuring performance optimization and avoiding deadlocks.', 'Ensure code quality through comprehensive testing and debugging.', 'Maintain high graphic standards and ensure brand consistency across all applications.', 'Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies, frameworks, and best practices to drive continuous improvement.', 'Requirements', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.", 'Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.', 'HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript', 'Hands-on experience with React, Angular, and Angular Material.', 'React, Angular, and Angular Material', 'Proficiency in back-end development using Python.', 'Python', 'Expertise in writing optimized SQL queries and working with relational databases.', 'Solid understanding of RESTful API design and integration.', 'Knowledge of modern authentication and authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token (JWT).', 'JSON Web Token (JWT)', 'Experience with front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, and NPM.', 'Babel, Webpack, and NPM', 'Ability to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions.', 'Familiarity with version control systems, primarily Git.', 'Git', 'Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work in a collaborative environment.', 'Benefits', 'Competitive remuneration and benefits package.', 'Bonus upon success.', 'Private medical insurance.', 'A team who is eager to provide the best possible solutions for our clients.', 'Formal training and development of your skills.', 'A place where your professional and personal success is our commitment.']

details: ['At DTS Cloud Security, an integral part of the DTS Group, we are at the forefront of innovation in cyber security, managed services and technologies. With our two high-tech data centers and our own security software, we offer customized hybrid solutions to our clients. Enjoy working in one of our 14 locations, with flat hierarchies and an open-door culture. Our diverse and international team of over 450 employees work in a flexible, friendly, and collaborative environment. Discover exciting opportunities with us, where your ideas are valued and your journey is our priority. Be a part of our mission to innovate and secure the digital future.', 'Python Developer â€“ Automation (m/f/d)', 'Python Developer â€“ Automation (m/f/d)', 'Location: Athens or Thessaloniki', 'Location:', 'Time: Immediately', 'Time:', 'Type of employment: Full-time, permanent contract', 'Type of employment:', 'Your tasks', 'Your tasks', 'Realization of applications for the automation of our infrastructure, cloud and security areas and connected backend systems', 'Contribution of creative ideas for new and further developments', 'Independent and/or joint design and implementation for security and security-related applications', 'Orchestrating in the environment of the DTS Datacenter', 'Development of requirements together with the operating team', 'Collaborative development of interfaces', 'Frequent exchange within the development team', 'Your profile', 'Your profile', 'Working experience with Python programming language and structured Python code (PEP 8 standard)', 'Working experience in at least one of Django, Flask or FastAPI and basic knowledge in SQL databases and SSR-based templating (htmx)', 'Knowledge in software testing and understanding of software development processes', 'Structured and solution-oriented way of thinking with eagerness to learn new languages and approaches', 'Distinct ability to work in a team and passion for modern IT', 'Fluency in written and spoken English', 'Our offer', 'Our offer', '30 days of vacation (regardless of the length of service)', 'Private health insurance for our employees and their dependents (spouse/children)', 'In-depth, comprehensive training (approx. 1-3 months) in Germany at our expenses included one monthly flight back to Greece during the whole training period', 'Go for EAT - Ticket restaurant card', 'Modern hybrid way of working, characterized by flexible working arrangements', 'Team-oriented working environment and a broad variety of tasks in an international and diverse team, based on trust and transparency', 'Continuous opportunity for personal and professional development and learning', 'Personal company hardware', 'Free snacks and beverages', 'Become part of our team and bring in your professional knowledge as well as your positive personality traits!', 'Have we sparked your interest? If so, we look forward to receiving your detailed application, stating your desired (gross) salary and the earliest possible starting date.', 'Do you have any further questions about your career at DTS? Please send us an email or give us a call!', 'Apply now!', 'Apply now!', 'DTS CLOUD SECURITY MonEPE', 'DTS CLOUD SECURITY MonEPE', 'Mike Wendler', 'Theofanous 4 & Kifisias Avenue corner â€“ 2nd floor', 'P.C 115 23', 'Athens', 'Phone: +49 5221 101 3885']

details: ['About the job', 'TEKA systems is looking for a Full Stack Developer to join our team in Chalandri.', 'Full Stack Developer', 'With more than 40 years, TEKA Systems Business Solutions has been a leading technology company specializing in providing cutting- edge business solutions to a diverse clientele. We are committed to delivering exceptional value and quality to our clients by leveraging innovative technologies and best practices. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to join our team and contribute to our mission of delivering excellence,', 'If you want to be part of this large and dynamic organization, TEKA SYSTEMS has the opportunity for you!', 'What you will need to do:', 'What you will need to do:', 'Develop and maintain web applications using modern frontend and backend technologies', 'Design and implement RESTful APIs and microservices', 'Work with databases (SQL and NoSQL) for efficient data management', 'Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create a seamless user experience', 'Optimize applications for performance and scalability', 'Write clean, maintainable, and testable code', 'Troubleshoot and debug issues across the stack', 'Stay updated with emerging technologies and best practices', 'What you need to possess:', 'What you need to possess:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field", '3 years working experience in full cycle projects', 'Very good knowledge of front-end laguages (HTML/CSS/Javascript)', 'Very good knowledge of back-end languages (node.js or python)', 'Very good knowledge of SQL. Experience with MVC frameworks.', 'What will lead you to success:', 'What will lead you to success:', 'Ability to understand business requirements', 'Ability to work as a team player in a highly collaborative team environment', 'Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously', 'Strong problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, and attention to detail', 'What we will offer to you:', 'What we will offer to you:', 'A workplace with a strong focus on values of teamwork, integrity, and ownership', 'Dynamic and friendly working environment', 'Competitive remuneration and benefits package', 'Continuous training and career development opportunities', 'Private medical & health insurance plan', 'Food vouchers']

details: ['We seek a highly motivated and skilled Workload Automation Engineer to join our dynamic team.  The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in optimizing and automating our operational processes, driving efficiency, and ensuring seamless workflow management. As a Workload Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, maintaining, and optimizing workload automation processes using industry-leading tools like Control-M and Automic, that streamline workloads and enhance overall productivity.', 'Your expertise will be essential in identifying bottlenecks and providing innovative solutions to improve application performance and job scheduling. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to gather business requirements, assess workload demands, and develop tailored automation strategies that align with organizational goals.', 'If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to contribute to a forward-thinking organization, we invite you to apply and join us in our mission to elevate operational excellence through automation.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Design, develop, and implement complex workload automation solutions using Control-M and/or Automic WLA.', 'Create and maintain job scheduling definitions, dependencies, and calendars.', 'Monitor and manage automated workflows to ensure reliability and performance.', 'Develop and maintain scripts (e.g., shell, Python, PowerShell) for automating tasks and processes.', 'Integrate workload automation tools with various applications and databases.', 'Collaborate with application teams to gather requirements for automation needs.', 'Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to job executions and scheduling.', 'Develop and maintain documentation for workflows and automation processes.', 'Evaluate and recommend new workload automation tools and technologies.', 'Perform regular maintenance and updates to existing automation frameworks.', 'Requirements:', 'Requirements:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.", 'Proven experience in workload automation and job scheduling tools such as Control-M, AutoSys, Automic, or similar.', 'Strong scripting skills (shell, Python, PowerShell, etc.).', 'Experience with database systems (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, Postgre).', 'Experience with operating systems (e.g., Linux, Windows)', 'Experience with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP) is a plus.', 'Experience with monitoring tools and performance tuning.', 'Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.', 'Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.', 'Benefits:', 'Benefits:', 'As an equal opportunity employer, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Our company is people - centric and offers personalized benefits to each employee:', 'We want you to be well compensated for what you bring in, so we offer an attractive salary package', 'Your health matters to us, so all colleagues have a private health insurance plan from day one', 'We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting projects', 'We never stop learning and evolving! You will have your own mentor and training program to help you develop in a company with unlimited possibilities and you will join our training sessions and online courses that we provide', 'We love the Relational vibes so we gather on smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together!', "Relational Financial Solutions adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published in https://www.relationalfs.com/legal-information/pri.... By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with Relational Financial Solutions you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorise Relational Financial Solutions to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line to the Policy."]

details:
['About Us', 'About Us', 'IQ Solutions SA is an ICT services company with over 20 years of presence in the field. We specialize in ICT systems integration for the corporate world and have built our Intellectual Property to develop a unique portfolio of products and services for the Maritime Shipping Industry, focusing on ICT systems operational efficiency and Cyber Security.
Amongst various applied innovations, IQ Solutions SA holds a global first in the Maritime Industry, VCell Cyber, which was awarded with a Type Approval for Cyber Security by Bureau Veritas Marine & Offshore as a complete, end-to-end, managed vessel ICT ecosystem.', 'About the Position', 'About the Position', 'We are looking for an IT Administrator that can provide the following:
-Installing, maintaining, and supporting workstations, servers and other information system assets for vessel IT infrastructure.
-Infrastructure monitoring, network configuring, monitoring and troubleshooting, backup, and replication monitoring, IP telephony configuring and monitoring, patch management.
-Resolves and/or escalates issues with network, systems and applications.
-Vessel attendances.
-Analyze current processes and propose enhancements for further improvement.
-Ability to retain knowledge and crossmatch new problems with previous ones.', 'Who will you be working with:', 'Who will you be working with:', '-Head of Marine Department
-Marine Support Department', 'The ideal candidate should have:', 'The ideal candidate should have:', '-Should hold a university degree in Computer Science/ Engineering or Information security.
-Should have 3 years overall experience, working as an ICT Professional.
-Experience in daily IT operations and security-related tasks.
-Microsoft Active Directory knowledge.
-Microsoft Hyper V knowledge.
-Microsoft Terminal Services knowledge.
-Certifications from major information technology and information security training providers (Microsoft, Pearsonâ€™s, ICS2, CompTIA, VMware, Cisco etc.) will be highly considered.
-Excellent written and verbal communication skills, in both Greek & English.
-Considerable drive and interest in taking on new tasks and challenges.
-Goal-oriented and enjoy taking initiative as well responsibility.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', '-Very friendly and professional working environment
-Opportunity to gain/enrich IT skills
-Further career opportunities
-Private Health insurance']

details: ['Description', 'Description', 'Faraday Norton, a holding company with a diverse portfolio in energy, real estate and retail is seeking IT Support Engineer.', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Install and configure end-user software and hardware', 'Manage network, telephony infrastructure and printers', 'Support internal users, identifying issues and providing efficient solutions', 'Manage MS 365 applications and users', 'Plan and undertake scheduled maintenance, upgrades and patching', 'Ensure stock level of equipment, consumables and other supplies', 'Maintain software and hardware inventory and be responsible for licenses administration and asset tracking', 'Participate in procurement and vendor proposal evaluation processes', 'Requirements', 'Requirements', 'BSc Degree in Computer Science or other relevant field', 'Between 3 - 5 years of proven experience as a Technical Support Engineer, System Administrator or similar role', 'MS Windows and MS Office setup and administration', 'Hands-on experience with VoIP call center equipment and software (softphone, physical phones, headphones, Asterisk PBX, ViciDial etc.)', 'Administration and management of MS 365 applications including, Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, One Drive for Business and Microsoft Teams.', 'Familiarity with routing, switching and firewalling is desirable', 'Resourcefulness and problem-solving skills', 'Strong organizational, coordination and time management skills', 'Excellent command of the Greek and English language, both written and oral is mandatory', 'What we Offer:', 'What we Offer:', 'At Faraday Norton, we value our people and aim to foster a supportive, high-performing work environment. We offer:', 'Competitive compensation package.', 'Modern and dynamic working environment with opportunities for growth in a developing and innovative company.', 'Private health insurance.', 'Continuous support and opportunities for training and professional development.', 'Ready for your next career step?', 'Ready for your next career step?', 'Join us at Faraday Norton and grow with a forward-thinking team.', 'Join us at Faraday Norton and grow with a forward-thinking team.']
tags: ['it support engineer', 'it engineer']

details: ['Company Profile', 'Company Profile', 'AIMS INTL. is an international company with offices and roughly 120 staff based in various parts of the world. For the past 41 years AIMS Intl has been engaged in the development, marketing, implementation, and support of its state-of-the-art Flight Operations software solution which has been successfully implemented in more than 200 airlines, making AIMS the largest supplier of Flight Operations systems in the world.', 'AIMS INTL', 'AIMS is committed to investing in its employees and the technologies to maintain its leadership while continuing its steady growth.', 'We are always keen to speak with talented, enthusiastic, ambitious and charismatic candidates, so if you believe your skill set covers the key accountabilities listed below, we would like to hear from you!', 'Job opportunities are now open to further man our Athens Greece office. We are currently seeking:', 'IT System Administrator / DevOPS (IT2024B)', 'IT System Administrator / DevOPS (IT2024B)', 'Required Skills', 'Required Skills', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.", '5+ years of experience as a DevOps Engineer or IT system administration,', 'Strong knowledge of networking concepts, protocols, and security best practices.', 'Strong expertise in AWS services such as EC2, S3, FSX, Lambda, and Cloudformation.', 'Experience with cybersecurity tools and techniques, including intrusion detection/prevention systems, antivirus software, and vulnerability scanning.', 'Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues independently.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.', 'Desired Skills', 'Desired Skills', 'Relevant certifications (e.g., Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator, CompTIA Network+, CCNA) are a plus.', 'AWS certifications (e.g., AWS Certified DevOps Engineer) are a plus.', 'Proven experience with Windows server administration, virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V).', 'Familiarization with Citrix, NetScaler, Fortigate, Fortiweb, Office 365 is beneficial', 'Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).', 'Familiarization with JIRA Software.', 'Knowledge of networking, IP, subnetting, VLANS.', 'Main Responsibilities', 'Main Responsibilities', "System Administration: Manage and maintain the company's IT and AWS cloud infrastructure, including servers, storage systems, virtualization platforms, and network devices. Collaborate with development teams to optimize application architecture for cloud deployment", 'System Administration', 'Server Configuration and Maintenance: Install, configure, and maintain Windows and Linux servers, ensuring high availability and performance.', 'Server Configuration and Maintenance', 'Network Management: Configure, monitor, and troubleshoot network devices such as switches, routers, firewalls, and VPNs to ensure smooth and secure data transmission.', 'Network Management', "Security Management: Implement and maintain security measures to protect the company's IT systems from unauthorized access, malware, and other cybersecurity threats.", 'Security Management', 'Backup and Disaster Recovery: Develop and implement backup and disaster recovery strategies to safeguard critical data and ensure business continuity in the event of system failures or disasters.', 'Backup and Disaster Recovery', 'Monitoring and Performance Tuning: Monitor system performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement optimizations to improve overall system efficiency and reliability.', 'Monitoring and Performance Tuning', 'Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate documentation of IT systems, configurations, and procedures. Generate reports on system performance, security incidents, and compliance status as needed.', 'Documentation and Reporting', 'Collaboration and Support: Collaborate with other IT teams, developers, and stakeholders to support software development, testing, and deployment activities. Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance to internal users as needed.', 'Collaboration and Support', 'Personal Characteristics', 'Personal Characteristics', 'Problem-Solving Skills: Proactive and resourceful in identifying and resolving technical challenges.', 'Problem-Solving Skills', 'Attention to Detail: Meticulous in configuring and managing IT systems to uphold quality standards.', 'Attention to Detail', 'Adaptability: Thrives in a fast-paced environment and quickly adapts to new technologies and challenges.', 'Adaptability', 'Team Player: Collaborates effectively with colleagues, shares knowledge, and contributes to collective goals.', 'Team Player', 'Communication Skills: Articulates technical concepts clearly and listens actively to ensure effective collaboration.', 'Communication Skills', 'Problem Ownership: Takes ownership of issues, ensuring timely resolution and satisfactory outcomes.', 'Problem Ownership', 'Continuous Learner: Passionate about learning and self-improvement to remain at the forefront of IT innovation.', 'Continuous Learner', 'Customer-Focused: Prioritizes the needs of stakeholders and end-users, delivering exceptional service and support.', 'Customer-Focused', 'Ethical Conduct: Upholds integrity, honesty, and ethical standards in all interactions and decision-making processes.', 'Ethical Conduct', 'Resilience: Maintains a positive attitude and perseveres through challenges to achieve goals and objectives.', 'Resilience', 'Company Offers', 'Company Offers', 'Opportunity to work with a talented team of professionals in a dynamic and collaborative environment.', 'Competitive salary and opportunities for professional development.', 'Exciting projects and the chance to make a real impact on the aviation industry through innovative software solutions.', 'Career growth and advancement opportunities within a growing company at the forefront of technology.', 'Contact Information', 'Contact Information', 'AIMS INTL, 340 Syngrou Ave.,', 'AIMS INTL', ', 340 Syngrou Ave.,', '176 73, site: www.aims.aero', '176 73, site: www.aims.aero', 'or e-mail: jobs@aims.aero', 'or e-mail: jobs@aims.aero']

role: IT Systems Trainer and Support (Fixed term contract)
details: ['Are you ready to discover the role of an IT Systems Trainer & Support operator in Netcompany-Intrasoft?', 'IT Systems Trainer and Support operator,', 'As an IT Systems Trainer and Support operator you will:', 'DeliverBusiness Applications training and support (on-the-job training, remote training, structured classroom training) to users', 'Prepare and update the training material', 'Provide 1st and 2nd level user support to clients.', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or Law', 'Experience with ticketing systems such as Atlassian JIRA or similar', 'Experience in being the liaison with other teams to identify issues and support issue resolution', 'Excellent knowledge of MS Office suite', 'Strong customer service orientation', 'Good communication & presentation skills', 'Very good command of the English language', 'It would also be a plus if you match some of the following:', 'Previous experience in business applications training and user support services, preferably within the public sector', 'Knowledge of e-learning platforms and tools.', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal allowance', 'Learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings).', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.']

['COMPANY', 'COMPANY', 'Established in Athens in 1990, Sugar World advanced the world of cake decorating in Greece by importing previously unavailable products, training courses and marketing tools from all over the world.', 'We have a network of customers both wholesale and retail covering the whole of Greece, including confectionary suppliers, catering companies, confectionary/bakery shops & chains, supermarkets, restaurants, hotels, kitchen supply stores and e-shops.', 'Along with the SugarWorld brand we also represent many worldwide leading brands. Sourcing new products and staying ahead of current trends together with offering the best service to our customers is the driving force for Sugar World.', 'We are looking for an IT & e-Commerce Executive. The ideal candidate will be able to deliver design solutions with flair for modern minimal design practices that support business needs, as well as support all creative projects related to our brand. Furthermore, he/she will be responsible for e-Commerce related tasks.', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', 'E-commerce

Assist with client communication regarding orders, payments, and delivery logistics when needed', 'Assist with incoming client inquiries when the sales team requires support, providing guidance on how to use the B2C/B2B ordering platform', 'Support order processing when necessary', 'Provide backup customer service via phone, email, and in-person interactions when the sales team is unavailable', 'Assist with client communication regarding orders, payments, and delivery logistics when needed', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE', 'MS Office & Excel skills', 'ERP & CRP Systems (knowledge of EPSILON ERP system preferred)', 'Fluent Greek and English', 'Previous experience in Food / DIY / Arts & Crafts industries ideal but not essential', 'SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES', 'SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES', 'Communication skills', 'Professionally and business orientated', 'Organisational and time management skills with ability to prioritise tasks and work methodically', 'Team player and responsive to feedback', 'Passion for food products and crafts', 'BENEFITS', 'BENEFITS', 'Being involved in a highly creative industry', 'Ability to influence the companyâ€™s direction through implementation of creative tools', 'Excellent working environment', 'Opportunity to learn, growth and knowledge sharing', 'Easily accessible offices (Argyroupoli metro station)', 'Interested candidates are invited to send their complete CV in English to hr@sugarworld.gr.', 'hr@sugarworld.gr.']

details: ['Welcome to Domes!', 'Welcome to Domes!', 'Domes Resorts is one of the most awarded and leading lifestyle hospitality brands in Greece, and one of the fastest up-and-coming in Europe.', 'Domes Resorts', 'With presence in Crete, Ionian Islands, Chalkidiki, Cyclades, Athens and Portugal, all our destinations have been handpicked with a culture to share and inspire by creating curated concepts and signature experiences through our 4 innovative brands and our affiliation with the biggest hospitality brands like Marriott & Hilton.', 'Our people constitute a key element of our success. We strongly support the power of our team, offering young people the chance to grow and own their career journey in a progressive & innovative working environment with passion, humbleness, and perseverance. Teamwork, integrity and career development are only some of the reasons that close to 2000 employees, each year, trust their future with us.', 'We are currently hiring for our operations in Athens, an IT Specialist.', 'IT Specialist', 'The Role:', 'The Role:', 'The role of the IT Specialist in Domes Resorts plays a multifaceted and pivotal role, ensuring that technology supports both operational efficiency and positive guestâ€™s experiences. From maintaining network infrastructure and ensuring cybersecurity to troubleshooting software systems and supporting staff, the ideal candidate is integral to the smooth functioning of Domesâ€™ modern businesses. As technology continues to evolve, the role will expand, presenting new challenges and exciting opportunities for innovation within the sector.', 'Some of the responsibilities:', 'Some of the responsibilities:', 'Network Infrastructure Management', 'Network Infrastructure Management', 'Responsible for overseeing the Domesâ€™ network infrastructure by ensuring that all servers, routers, switches, and wireless access points function optimally.', 'Monitors performance to avoid network outages or slowdowns that could disrupt guest services or internal operations.', 'Manages firewall settings, intrusion detection systems, and secures networks, ensuring compliance with privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, PCI DSS) for handling payment and personal guest information.', 'Software and Systems Integration', 'Software and Systems Integration', 'Ensures that the PMS (Property Management System) runs smoothly and integrates effectively with other hotel management software such as Point of Sale (POS) systems, housekeeping management tools, and revenue management systems.', 'Maintains systems that focus on enhancing the guestâ€™s experiences, like digital check-ins, in-room technology, guest service apps, and smart room technologies to be users-friendly and function correctly.', 'Also manages other essential business applications used by the company, such as accounting software, T&C management systems, customer relationship management (CRM) systems, and email platforms to be regularly updated and patched.', 'Technical Support and Troubleshooting', 'Technical Support and Troubleshooting', 'Provides technical support for Domesâ€™ staff, ensuring that employees can use the technology effectively with system malfunctions, training them on new software or hardware, and troubleshooting technical problems that may arise.', 'Ensures that all the Domesâ€™ computers, servers, printers, and other technology equipment are in good working order. This includes conducting regular maintenance, replacing faulty equipment, and ensuring that all devices meet the operational needs of the hotel.', 'Cybersecurity and Data Protection', 'Cybersecurity and Data Protection', 'Ensures that all data systems and networks are secure from potential cyber threats such as hacking, malware, and phishing attacks. This includes managing antivirus software, applying regular security patches to systems, and performing vulnerability assessments.', 'Also ensures that regular data backups are completed in case of a disaster or a system failure. The IT Specialist designs and implements disaster recovery protocols and ensures that Domes Resorts can restore critical data in the event of a technical failure.', 'Guarantees that Domes Resorts complies with all the relevant regulations regarding guest data protection and storage by being familiar with privacy laws and data protection regulations that apply to the hospitality industry (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, PCI DSS).', 'Requirements', 'Useful to have:', 'Useful to have:', 'A diploma in Information Technology, Computer Science, Network Engineering, Cybersecurity, or a related field is required.', 'Strong network and infrastructure skills with an in-depth knowledge of networking protocols, router/switch configuration, wireless technologies, and troubleshooting techniques.', 'Expertise in network security, firewalls, encryption, intrusion detection systems (IDS), and data backup/recovery strategies.', 'Proficiency in managing both Windows and Linux-based systems, as well as understanding the integration of various software applications used in hospitality (e.g., PMS, POS systems, booking engines).', 'A minimum of 4 years of experience with a focus on large-scale IT projects, and managing complex systems are required.', 'Knowledge of the English language, a second language will be considered a plus.', 'What you will bring:', 'What you will bring:', 'Strong verbal and communication skills so as to be able to explain complex technical issues in simple terms to non-technical staff and guests.', 'The ability to multitask and prioritize responsibilities is crucial as it needs to coordinate various programs, staff schedules, and administrative duties efficiently.', 'The ability to manage technology-related projects, including system implementations, upgrades, and migrations, while coordinating with other departments and ensuring minimal disruption to hotel operations.', 'A problem-solving approach with an eye to detail to quickly identify and resolve technical issues, minimizing downtime and disruption to operations.', 'Adaptability skills and being able to grasp new learning opportunities as the hospitality industry embraces new technologies.', 'Benefits', 'You will benefit from:', 'You will benefit from:', 'Becoming a member of an organization, the number one priority is its people, it cares about their well-being, and it gives them room to grow and develop their skills', 'Various and diverse opportunities within the Group', 'Feeling safe and secure within a fast-paced organization', 'Competitive remuneration package', 'Domes Resorts is an equal opportunity Employer. All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality.', 'Domes Resorts', 'Please note: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.', 'Please note:']

details: ["MetaDocs LTD seeks a highly skilled and motivated IT Specialist to join our IT Department. As an IT Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in providing exceptional technical support to our valued customers. You will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies and significantly impact our clients' information management systems.", 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Provide technical support and assistance to customers via phone, email, and remote sessions.', 'Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to our email and document management solutions.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely resolution of customer issues.', 'Document and escalate complex technical problems as needed.', "Maintain a deep understanding of MetaDocs' products and services.", 'Assist in the development of knowledge base articles.', 'Qualifications:', 'Qualifications:', '5+ years of experience working in a similar position.', 'Strong understanding of Microsoft Exchange, IIS, Active Directory, and Microsoft Cloud Services.', 'Proficiency in various Microsoft Windows Operating Systems.', 'Familiarity with Microsoft SQL (desirable but not mandatory).', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both Greek and English.', 'Customer-oriented with a strong commitment to providing exceptional service.', 'Ability to work independently and as part of a team.', 'Strong analytical and troubleshooting abilities.', 'IT-related degree preferred (not mandatory).', 'Microsoft qualifications preferred (not mandatory).', 'At MetaDocs LTD, we believe in nurturing talent and providing opportunities for professional growth. As a member of our IT Department, you will have access to ongoing training and development programs to enhance your skills and advance your career. We offer a competitive salary based on qualifications and experience, a private insurance package, a supportive work environment, and the chance to work with cutting-edge technology.', 'Freelance (Hybrid): The first month will be in-office, after which a flexible hybrid model will be agreed upon. Candidates must be able to issue invoices or be willing to register for one if not already established. This job requires an 8-hour workday, Monday through Friday.', 'Freelance (Hybrid)', 'How to Apply:', 'How to Apply:', 'If you are a dedicated and technically proficient individual passionate about helping customers succeed, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.', 'MetaDocs LTD is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Join MetaDocs LTD and become an integral part of our mission to revolutionize email management solutions.', 'MetaDocs LTD - Empowering Businesses Through Innovative Email and Document Management.', 'MetaDocs LTD - Empowering Businesses Through Innovative Email and Document Management.']
tags: ['microsoft dynamics 365', 'technical specialist', 'it department', 'it specialist', 'it', 'freelance it', 'it freelancer', 'it support', 'technical support', 'senior it specialist']

details: ['Are you ready to discover the role of an IT Systems Trainer & Support operator in Netcompany-Intrasoft?', 'IT Systems Trainer and Support operator,', 'As an IT Systems Trainer and Support operator you will:', 'DeliverBusiness Applications training and support (on-the-job training, remote training, structured classroom training) to users', 'Prepare and update the training material', 'Provide 1st and 2nd level user support to clients.', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or Law', 'Experience with ticketing systems such as Atlassian JIRA or similar', 'Experience in being the liaison with other teams to identify issues and support issue resolution', 'Excellent knowledge of MS Office suite', 'Strong customer service orientation', 'Good communication & presentation skills', 'Very good command of the English language', 'It would also be a plus if you match some of the following:', 'Previous experience in business applications training and user support services, preferably within the public sector', 'Knowledge of e-learning platforms and tools.', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal allowance', 'Learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings).', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.']

role: IT Business Solutions Senior Manager, TEMES SA
details: ['TEMES Group is a leading investor, developer and operator of high-end tourism and real estate destinations in Greece.', 'The Group owns Costa Navarino, one of the largest tourism investments in the Mediterranean. The destination encompasses five distinct resort areas developed on 1,000 hectares, featuring 5-star hotels, luxury private residences, signature golf courses, and many year-round facilities and activities.', 'The Group also controls Ionian Hotel Enterprises S.A., owner of a historic and flagship property in the center of Athens, former Hilton Athens, which is currently being transformed into a new city destination.', 'Additionally, TEMES has partnered with Lamda Development S.A. with the majority stake in the joint development of two state-of-the-art hotels along with branded residences in the framework of the landmark project of The Ellinikon, which aims to put the â€˜Athens Rivieraâ€™ on the global tourism map.', 'We are seeking a highly experienced and strategic IT Business Solution Senior Manager to join our IT team. This role will act as the liaison between IT and business units, while leading digital transformation initiatives to enhance customer experience, streamline operations, and drive business growth. The position will be reporting to the IT Director.', 'IT Business Solution Senior Manager', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap Implementation:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap Implementation', 'Understand and address business needs and challenges related to commerce and digital solutions, including CRM', 'Key contributor in developing and driving the digital transformation roadmap, leveraging on CRM, AI and other technology trends', 'Work closely with stakeholders to ensure alignment with business needs and vendor partners to select and deliver solutions effectively', 'Lead efforts to build a skilled and dedicated team to support business solutions development in the commerce area. This includes identifying key roles, recruiting top talent, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.', 'Project Management:', 'Project Management', 'Oversee the implementation of digital solutions to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.', 'Manage timelines, budgets, and resources effectively.', 'Collaboration and Communication:', 'Collaboration and Communication', 'Ensure effective communication between IT and business units.', 'Conduct regular meetings to discuss progress, challenges, and opportunities for improvement.', 'Change Management:', 'Change Management', 'Ensure smooth adoption of new technologies and address any resistance to change.', 'Performance Metrics:', 'Performance Metrics', 'Define key performance indicators to measure the success of digital transformation and AI initiatives.', 'Conduct regular performance reviews to ensure goals are being met and identify areas for improvement.', 'Requirements', '10+ years of experience in IT, with significant experience in digital transformation and IT solutions delivery.', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field', 'Masterâ€™s degree is a plus.', 'Proven track record in driving successful digital initiatives and delivering business solutions', 'Strong knowledge of business processes analysis and challenges', 'Passionate about delivering solutions and solving customer and business problems', 'Experience with Product Lifecycle Management , project management tools and methodologies (e.g. Agile, Scrum)', 'Deep understanding of CRM systems, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms, AI, and digital transformation strategies.', 'Strong decision-making skills and ability to prioritize initiatives.', 'Exceptional interpersonal skills for working cross functionally across organizational levels with the ability to collaborate across a diverse, multi-functional environment', 'Strong team management skills, provide direction and mentorship to his/her team (junior to mid-level experience)', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary and benefits package', 'Opportunities for professional development and continuous learning.', 'Collaborative and innovative work environment.']

details: ['Cosmos Sport SA, member of JD Sports Fashion Plc, founded in September of 1982. First store opened in Heraklion-Crete and since then the network expanded 98 further physical stores in Greece & Cyprus, 5 retail brands (JD Sports, Cosmos Sport, Sneaker10, Slamdunk, Rundome) 8 on-line shops and thousands of happy customers in Greece and Cyprus. Cosmos Sport is a constantly growing omnichannel company with a strong passion for sportswear, street style and limited items. Our team consists of 1800+ highly skilled, self-motivated young people, who love sports and have a passion for innovation! We are proud that Cosmossport.gr is now the No1 on-line store in the industry also selling abroad, having been awarded for 7 consecutive years as the best online sports shop in the country in e-volution Awards. We are excited being a preferred partner for global brands like Nike, Adidas, Reebok in the SEE.', 'Cosmos Sport SA', 'JD Sports Fashion Plc', '98 further physical stores in Greece & Cyprus, 5 retail brands', '8 on-line shops', '1800+', 'We are looking for an IT Project Manager to join the IT team, based in our HOs either in Kolonos, Athens or in Heraklion, Crete.', 'IT Project Manager', "As an IT Project Manager you will oversee IT projects from start to finish, coordinating teams, resources, and stakeholders. You'll be responsible for planning, executing, and monitoring project progress, managing risks and budgets, ensuring quality, and aligning IT initiatives with business goals. This position requires a blend of technical knowledge, leadership skills, and the ability to effectively communicate across all levels of our organization to deliver successful technology solutions. If you're a driven professional with a track record of managing complex IT projects, we want to hear from you. Apply now to help shape our technological future!", 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'Plan and execute IT projects from start to finish', 'Develop project schedules, budgets, and resource plans', 'Lead cross-functional teams and manage stakeholders', 'Monitor progress, risks, and quality', 'Ensure timely project delivery within budget', 'Prepare status reports for management', 'Manage vendor relationships', 'Implement change control processes', 'Align projects with organizational goals', 'Ensure compliance with IT policies and regulations', 'Requirements', "Bachelor's degree in IT / Computer Science / Business Administration or related field", 'At least 2 years experience in IT Project Management', 'Proven track record of successfully delivering complex IT projects', 'Excellent team management abilities', 'Analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Good written and verbal communication skills', 'Budgeting and resource allocation experience', 'Experience with project management software', 'Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines', 'Fluency in English and solid presentation skills', 'Benefits', 'Why Youâ€™ll Love It Here', 'Competitive compensation package', 'Private health & medical insurance', 'Career development opportunities & education programs', 'Up to 75% discount at the European University of Cyprus (face-to-face or online attendance)', "Free Diagnostic Tests for all our employees at the Euromedica Group's diagnostic centres", 'One day off, part of our "parentsâ€™ day off" program', 'Generous employee discount in all our brands (JD Sports, Cosmos Sport, Sneaker10, Slamdunk, Rundome)', 'Extras, discounts and perks - Being a valued member of Cosmos Sport team means a lot to us! We offer a variety of 100+ cool extras link here!', 'At Cosmos Sport, we are committed to providing a great place to work for all of our people, without regard to race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientations, genders, or disability.']

details: ['Are you ready to discover the role of an IT Systems Trainer & Support operator in Netcompany-Intrasoft?', 'IT Systems Trainer and Support operator,', 'As an IT Systems Trainer and Support operator you will:', 'DeliverBusiness Applications training and support (on-the-job training, remote training, structured classroom training) to users', 'Prepare and update the training material', 'Provide 1st and 2nd level user support to clients.', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or Law', 'Experience with ticketing systems such as Atlassian JIRA or similar', 'Experience in being the liaison with other teams to identify issues and support issue resolution', 'Excellent knowledge of MS Office suite', 'Strong customer service orientation', 'Good communication & presentation skills', 'Very good command of the English language', 'It would also be a plus if you match some of the following:', 'Previous experience in business applications training and user support services, preferably within the public sector', 'Knowledge of e-learning platforms and tools.', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal allowance', 'Learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings).', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.']

['At TP Greece, we are looking for Junior IT Helpdesk Technicians (working from our premises in Athens and not remotely) to support our companyâ€™s departments, liaise between them and the core IT teams, and keep them up and running with the latest software updates.', 'TP Greece', 'Junior IT Helpdesk Technicians', 'After joining our Helpdesk Technicians team, you will be responsible for hardware and software issues, vulnerability patching, installations, configurations, and end-user needs.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Ensure maximum uptime by addressing critical issues as they arise, and utilizing troubleshooting, multi-tasking and analytical skills.', 'Effectively manage time and priorities, delivering projects on schedule and communicating issues proactively', 'Coordinate projects between client, department, and IT', 'Ability to thrive in fast-paced environments', 'Requirements & Skills:', 'Requirements & Skills:', '1 year or more of relevant work experience and experience working in a corporate environment is preferred', 'Ability to setup, configure, and perform day-to-day maintenance on workstations', 'Basic networking and OS (Windows or MacOS) knowledge is required', 'Excellent communication skills, including the ability to instruct on technical concepts if needed.', 'Proficient knowledge of English required, written and spoken', 'Punctuality, professionalism, and time flexibility', 'Experience with ticketing systems, Avaya, Ivanti, and VMware Horizon environments will be an advantage', 'It is very important that you are experienced in collaborating with other teams, to troubleshoot and resolve an array of technical issues.', 'Salary Range:', 'Salary Range:', '1.045â‚¬ (gross)']

details: ['With a legacy spanning over five decades, Bluegr Hotels & Resorts has firmly established itself as a leader in the hospitality industry, embodying the three pillars of quality tourism: exceptional locations, exemplary services, and authentic experiences. Its portfolio includes three distinctive hotels in Creteâ€”Minos Beach Art Hotel, a member of Design Hotels and Marriott Bonvoy; the holistic wellness retreat Minos Palace Resort; and the family-friendly Candia Park Villageâ€”as well as the boutique Life Gallery Athens in the capital. These properties seamlessly integrate into their natural surroundings, highlighting the unique character of each region.', 'Bluegr Hotels & Resorts', 'Minos Beach Art Hotel', 'Minos Palace Resort', 'Candia Park Village', 'Life Gallery Athens', 'Its commitment to its people, culture, and sustainability is underscored by numerous international accolades, including a five-star certification from the EFQM Business Excellence Model. It has also been recognized as one of Fortuneâ€™s 100 Best Companies to Work for in Europe 2024 and is the only hospitality company to rank among the top ten workplaces in Greece for two consecutive years, according to Great Place to Work Hellas.', 'Guided by the belief that hospitality and culture are deeply intertwined, Bluegr actively supports contemporary artistic creation and research through the G & A Mamidakis Foundation, further cementing its role as a champion of culture and innovation in the industry.', 'G & A Mamidakis Foundation', 'Bluegr people are the heart of our success, creating exceptional experiences and delivering outstanding value to guests worldwide.', 'Bluegr people are the heart of our success, creating exceptional experiences and delivering outstanding value to guests worldwide.', 'We are currently looking for a visionary\u202fInformation Technology (IT) Manager based in Athens headquarters.', 'Information Technology (IT) Manager', 'The IT Manager will drive IT strategy, infrastructure, and operational excellence, ensuring seamless system performance that meets and exceeds the diverse needs of stakeholders.', 'As a key leader in digital transformation, you will oversee technology planning, implementation, troubleshooting, and maintenance, continuously optimizing processes to enhance efficiency, innovation, and guest experiences across Bluegr.', 'We are looking for a tech trendsetter ready to challenge, excel and make the difference!', 'Education & Certifications  & Certifications', 'Education & Certifications  & Certifications', 'University/College degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.', 'MSc, MBA or relevant will be considered a plus.', 'Professional/Technology certifications are a plus.', 'Experience', 'Experience', '3-7 years of experience in an IT managerial role.', 'Hospitality sector experience preferred.', 'Strong background in IT stakeholder and external vendor management.', 'Service Level Agreement (SLA) management expertise.', 'Technical Skills', 'Technical Skills', 'Databases & ERP: SQL, Entersoft ERP.', 'WiFi & Network Management: Cisco, Mikrotik, Telecom engineering.', 'Systems & Infrastructure: Windows Server, Virtualization (Hyper-V), Backup operations.', 'Security & Cybersecurity: Firewall management, Email security, Antivirus (ESET, Microsoft Defender), MDM, VPN.', 'Software & Applications: Protel PMS, POS systems, TV headend systems.', 'Microsoft Tools: Office 365, Power BI, Dynamics, SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive.', 'Hardware & Troubleshooting: Operating systems, PABX operations.', 'Core Competencies', 'Core Competencies', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', 'Excellent command of English.', 'Problem-solving and critical thinking.', 'Innovative mindset with a passion for technology-driven solutions.', 'Ability to train and present technical concepts effectively.', 'Strong organizational and time-management skills.', 'Self-motivated, proactive, and adaptable in fast-paced environments.', 'Team player with a collaborative approach.', 'The\u202f IT Manager\u202fwill be based in Athens and will be expected to travel to Bluegr hotels', 'IT Manager', 'Bluegr\u202fHotels\u202f&\u202fResorts\u202foffers:', 'Bluegr\u202fHotels\u202f&\u202fResorts\u202foffers:', 'Bluegr family members are dedicated to creating memorable and unique experiences for both our Blue Team members and guests. Guided by our Value Compass, we seek passionate hospitality professionals who strive for excellence in bringing our purpose and vision to life.', 'If this is you, consider joining our team!', 'All applicants will be acknowledged and treated in strict confidence.', 'All applicants will be acknowledged and treated in strict confidence.', 'Are you ready to Live the Blue Experience?']
