details: ['Are you ready to discover the role of an IT Systems Trainer & Support operator in Netcompany-Intrasoft?', 'IT Systems Trainer and Support operator,', 'As an IT Systems Trainer and Support operator you will:', 'DeliverBusiness Applications training and support (on-the-job training, remote training, structured classroom training) to users', 'Prepare and update the training material', 'Provide 1st and 2nd level user support to clients.', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', 'Bachelor degree in Computer Science / Information Technology or Law', 'Experience with ticketing systems such as Atlassian JIRA or similar', 'Experience in being the liaison with other teams to identify issues and support issue resolution', 'Excellent knowledge of MS Office suite', 'Strong customer service orientation', 'Good communication & presentation skills', 'Very good command of the English language', 'It would also be a plus if you match some of the following:', 'Previous experience in business applications training and user support services, preferably within the public sector', 'Knowledge of e-learning platforms and tools.', 'Being a part of the Netcompany-Î™ntrasoft team, you will be provided with:', 'A seamless onboarding experience and a buddy to support you on your first steps', 'A competitive compensation & benefits package', 'Health and life insurance program', 'Meal allowance', 'Learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings).', 'Our culture', 'Values', '#BePartOfSomethingGreat!', 'Please submit your CV in English. All applications will be treated as strictly confidential.']

['Do you have experience in IT Support and a passion for problem-solving?  
Would you like to work in a company with over 40 years of industry presence and a leading position in the wholesale trade?', 'ManpowerGroup Greece, on behalf of our client, is seeking an IT Support Specialist.', 'Our client is a well-established company in the import and distribution of promotional items, corporate apparel, and accessories. With a strong presence in Greece, Cyprus, and the Balkans, they collaborate with top European brands and maintain the largest stock in their industry, ensuring fast delivery times and exceptional service to a diverse professional client base.', 'ğŸ“Œ Location: Eastern Thessaloniki', 'ğŸ“ Working Model: On-site, Working Hours: 09:00-17:00', 'ğŸ–‹ï¸You will be reporting to: CEO', 'What you will do:', 'You will be responsible for the technical support of the organization, including onsite user support, computer setup, software installations, troubleshooting, and managing network and local resources.', 'More specifically, you will:', 'More specifically, you will:', 'â€¢ Provide technical support for Windows Server, DC Backup , Active Directory, and Azure 
â€¢ Manage and support Office365 , SharePoint, SQL databases, and server backups 
â€¢ Handle Softone ERP, and HRM system 
â€¢ Network Administration, H/W & S/W management and peripheral devices support 
â€¢ Maintain security infrastructure, including firewalls, antivirus, and VPN 
â€¢ Oversee VoIP telephony systems 
â€¢ Train and guide internal users on IT-related topics', "â€¢ Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field

details: ['As an ESM / ITSM Consultant, you will be an integral part of our software development and support team. You will be responsible for configuring, maintaining, enhancing, and supporting BMC software products and similar tools. Your role involves collaborating with software engineers to deliver solutions aligned with user needs and business requirements. Additionally, you will provide technical support to customers, perform software upgrades, and ensure compliance with licensing agreements.', 'Your Tasks:', 'Your Tasks:', "Configure, maintain, enhance, and support the top market vendors' ESM / ITSM software products.", 'Customize and add new features to software solutions based on business requirements.', 'Develop software using low-code and no-code platforms to address specific needs.', 'Support customer operations related to software packages and developed solutions.', 'Conduct tests for applications, troubleshoot problems, and assist with product launches.', 'Provide technical support to resolve application-related issues promptly.', 'Perform software upgrades and manage software licensing.', 'Your Skills & Knowledge:', 'Your Skills & Knowledge:', '1 to 3 years of experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer.', 'Good knowledge of Java, JavaScript, REST API, HTML and CSS.', 'Familiarity with Apache Maven and Eclipse IDE is a plus.', 'Administrator or Developer experience on BMC ITSM or similar tools preferred.', 'Proficiency in test-driven development methodologies.', 'Ability to document requirements and specifications accurately.', 'Experience with relational database management systems (RDBMS).', 'Familiarity with reporting tools such as Grafana and YellowFin is advantageous.', 'Knowledge of Operations Management and Service Management tools is beneficial.', 'Strong problem-solving skills to address technical challenges effectively.', 'Excellent teamwork skills to collaborate with internal teams and customers.', 'Eagerness to take on new responsibilities and challenges.', 'ITIL v4 certification is a plus.', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Informatics, or related field.', 'Benefits:', 'Benefits:', 'As an equal opportunity employer, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Our company is people - centric and offers personalized benefits to each employee:', 'We want you to be well compensated for what you bring in, so we offer an attractive salary package', 'Your health matters to us, so all colleagues have a private health insurance plan from day one', 'We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting projects', 'We never stop learning and evolving! You will have your own mentor and training program to help you develop in a company with unlimited possibilities and you will join our training sessions and online courses that we provide', 'We love the Relational vibes so we gather on smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together!', "Relational Financial Solutions adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy as published in https://www.relationalfs.com/legal-information/pri.... By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with Relational Financial Solutions you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorise Relational Financial Solutions to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line to the Policy."]

Map user requirements to system capabilities. and backlog prioritization', 'Conduct workshops and interviews to validate requirements and ensure stakeholder needs are understood. Create comprehensive BRDs, use cases, user stories, and functional specifications', "Coordinate with the developers' team for software customizations. Monitor the implementation of software customizations", 'Act as a liaison between customer stakeholders and communicate customer issues to the relevant technical teams', "Participate the User Acceptance Test (UAT), support activities and act as a point of contact for the Customer's Users", 'Perform Unit & Integration Tests on software customizations and custom development', 'What would make you a fit for the role:', "Bachelor's degree in business administration, Information Technology, or a related field. Analyst', 'Experience with large-scale software implementation projects, preferably within the public sector, banking or taxation domain', 'Proven ability to gather and document complex business ['The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining, optimizing, and securing our companyâ€™s network infrastructure and on-prem/cloud services-environment, ensuring reliable and efficient IT operations. This role will include managing Active Directory services, enabling secure and efficient user management across the organization. You will collaborate closely with other IT team members to provide technical support, manage network hardware, monitor security protocols, and support hybrid infrastructure.', 'Key Responsibilities:
Network Administration:
Manage and maintain the companyâ€™s on-premises network, including routers, switches, firewalls, VPNs, and Wi-Fi systems.
Monitor network performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement solutions to enhance network reliability and performance.
Develop and enforce network policies and procedures, including network security protocols.

Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure Management:
Administer a hybrid environment combining on-premises and cloud infrastructure to support applications, data storage, and backup needs.
Administer Microsoft SQL DB is a strong plus
Manage Active Directory services across the hybrid environment, including user provisioning, synchronization, group policies, and access management in both on-premises and cloud directories.
Optimize resource allocation across on-premises and cloud environments, ensuring cost-effectiveness and efficient performance.

Security & Compliance:
Monitor and secure network and cloud environments against unauthorized access, vulnerabilities, and cyber threats.
Conduct regular audits, backups, and disaster recovery planning.
Stay updated on cybersecurity best practices and apply these within network, on-prem and cloud infrastructure.

IT Support & Troubleshooting:
Provide technical support to internal teams and resolve hardware, software, and network issues.
Maintain IT infrastructure documentation, including Active Directory structure, and update system inventory.
Coordinate with third-party vendors for maintenance and troubleshooting as necessary.

System Optimization & Continuous Improvement:
Continuously evaluate and optimize network performance, identifying opportunities for efficiency improvements.
Implement automation and monitoring tools to improve system reliability and scalability.
Participate in capacity planning, ensuring the network and cloud infrastructure, including Active Directory, can support future growth.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Experience: 3 to 5 years in network administration or IT infrastructure roles.

Technical Skills:
Proficiency with networking protocols and technologies (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLANs).
Hands-on experience managing firewalls, routers, and switches (e.g., Cisco, Fortinet).
Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (preferably Azure or AWS).
Expertise in managing and configuring Active Directory in both on-premises and cloud (Entra ID) environments.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Network Administration:', 'Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure Management:', 'Security & Compliance:', 'IT Support & Troubleshooting:', 'System Optimization & Continuous Improvement:', 'Required Skills & Qualifications:', 'Experience:', 'Technical Skills:', 'Expertise in managing and configuring VMware Server (Esxi 6.0)  on-premises.', 'Knowledge of hybrid cloud and on-premises integration strategies

Security Knowledge: Familiarity with security best practices, VPNs, SDWAN, firewalls, and anti-virus solutions.

Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.

Certifications (preferred): CCNA, CompTIA Network+, Fortinet, Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate, AWS Certified SysOps Administrator, VMware Certified

['Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'Alumil, one of the most evolved and technologically advanced groups in research, development and producing of architectural aluminium systems in Europe, desires to cover the following position:', 'IT Business Analyst', 'IT Business Analyst', 'The role', 'The role', "Our IT Business Analyst is an integral part of a cross-functional, fast-evolving team that bridges the gap between technology and business needs. Your daily life involves engaging with users, developers, and external IT partners to gather, evaluate, and translate business requirements into precise, actionable plans. When a new IT project is initiated, you're the first to dive into understanding the needs behind itâ€”identifying stakeholders, capturing the requirements and ensuring that every technical aspect aligns with the business goals. You guide the process from concept to delivery, making sure that what gets built is not only functional but truly fits the users' needs. Whether youâ€™re drafting project documentation, running a cost-benefit analysis, or supporting user training, your work has a direct impact on project success and team alignment. This is a full-time on-site role as an IT Business Analyst at Alumil located in Thessaloniki.", 'Your impact', 'Your impact', "To thrive in this role, you need a strong analytical mindset and a deep understanding of both technical systems and business operations. But that's just the start. We're looking for a people-focused professionalâ€”someone who can simplify complexity, navigate competing priorities, and communicate clearly with everyone from stakeholders to developers. You love the pace, the variety, and the satisfaction of seeing a well-built solution come to life. Your main focus at the moment is in implementing an ERP transition, together with the rest of the team. Your daily routine is rigorous but ever challenging!", 'Requirements', 'Proven experience for 2-5 years in a similar position is required', 'Bachelor in IT, Business Administration, Economics or any relevant background', 'MSc in MBA, Informatics or Project Management will be a plus', 'Excellent use of English (oral and written)', 'SAP ERP knowledge would be an asset', 'Desired knowledge of ERP, WMS, CRM, BI, B2B programs', 'Ability to travel abroad', 'Good knowledge of Databases (SQL)', 'Knowledge of German will be a plus', 'Organization & communication skills', 'Problem-solving ability and critical thinking', 'Benefits', 'Provision of private life & health insurance', 'Benefits according to performance', 'Continuous learning and support', 'Excellent working environment', 'Annual training plan based on your needs', 'Role specific benefits', 'About us', 'About us', 'At ALUMIL we are building excellence every day.', 'Alumil has more than 30 years of experience in the production of architectural aluminium systems and more than 3.000 employees. We are one of the most advanced companies globally owning state-of-the art production lines in our 12 factories in Europe. Alumil, is a family-owned business that also embraces all of its employees like family. Our cultureâ€™s primary focus is on integrity, team spirit, initiative, loyalty, sustainability and â€œmerakiâ€ (spirited work).', 'ALUMIL opposes any discrimination, unequal treatment and violation of human rights and ensures the provision of equal opportunities at work. When hiring and evaluating employees, it does not discriminate based on race, gender, religion, age, disability, sexual orientation, nationality, political beliefs or social status.']

details:
['Are you a skilled mid-level Web Developer with a strong technical foundation looking to take the next step in your career? Would you like to grow your impact by joining a leading Online Travel Agency (OTA) thatâ€™s shaping the future of online reservation systems with innovative technologies?', 'Web Developer', 'The Web Developer position is full-time and permanent, based in Nea Makri, East Attica, Greece. The working model can be hybrid.', 'The Web Developer position is full-time and permanent', 'The working model can be hybrid.', 'GOFERRY is a leading online ferry booking system that has been operating worldwide since 2007. Our team currently develops online ferry booking systems for end users and B2B applications.', 'As a Web Developer, you will join our experienced development team and work with the latest technologies in .NET and front-end UI frameworks. Youâ€™ll contribute to building and maintaining modern, high-performance booking systems for users worldwide. In this role, you will take ownership of key development tasks on large-scale .NET and Vue projects. You will work closely with your agile team to ensure efficient and high-quality delivery, while also collaborating with colleagues to troubleshoot issues, implement solutions, and enhance the user experience. You will actively participate in coding, reviewing pull requests, and contribute to ongoing improvements, all while focusing on continuous learning and growth within the team.', 'Web Developer', 'Duties', 'Duties', 'As a Web Developer, you will join an autonomous team of software engineers, and your primary duties will be the following:', 'Web Developer', 'â— Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code
â— Develop data processing solutions per specifications
â— Support bug fixes and existing feature enhancements
â— Utilize, communicate and follow coding standards', 'Tech stack: Most sites and services are written in C# / ASP.NET, and new services are written in .NET Core. New applications use vue.js in the front end, while older ones use jQuery. MS SQL Server is used for most storage needs, but Redis is used when applicable. In addition, the company uses Git for code versioning and CI.', 'Prerequisites', 'Prerequisites', 'â— Minimum 2 years of experience
â— Good knowledge of C# .NET Core, EF Core, jQuery, Vue.js or similar frameworks, MS SQL
â— Good knowledge of CSS3, HTML (HTML5), Responsive web design
â— English speaking', 'Desired', 'Desired', 'â— Experience with complex applications, APIs and BackOffice systems
â— Basic knowledge of Varnish, Redis, and other supplementary technologies used in the modern development process
â— Experience with Git based development workflows and agile software processes
â— Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) Methods
â— Azure Pipelines', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'â— Join a medium-sized team of highly motivated developers
â— Competitive remuneration package
â— Semi-flexible working hours
â— Possibility of hybrid collaboration (remote work-office presence)']

details: ['Mellon Technologies SA, seeks to hire a Senior Procurement Officer on behalf of a large Financial Institute.', 'Senior Procurement Officer', 'By joining this role, youâ€™ll be part of the IT Strategic Procurement Department which is responsible for managing and processing demand related to IT goods and services as requested by the Bankâ€™s Units and Subsidiaries.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Â·        Management of requests mainly of a strategic nature and conducting tenders for the supply of services and goods in IT projects, to new and existing suppliers, to cover the needs of the Group. For example, the IT Procurement Department deals with projects that contribute to the completion of the Bank Transformation Program plan, Cloud Provider & Services project, projects concerning systemic implementation of HR, IT Outsourcing projects etc.', 'Â·        Conducting negotiations with suppliers, indicatively regarding costs and specifications for new as well as existing (business as usual) projects and requests.', 'Â·        Monitoring spend under his/hers responsibility. Identification of operational improvements for the Bank and management of related actions.', 'Â·        Direct cooperation with the requesting Units to understand and process their requests, as well as with other Support Units regarding the completeness of the requests (budget, etc.).', 'Â·        Adherence to a code of ethics in all communications with suppliers.', 'Â·        Preparation and submission of requests for approval to the Banksâ€™ Group Procurement Committee and their presentation.', 'Requirements', 'Â·        Have 5 years professional experience within an established organization in Procurement or in a related field', 'Â·        Hold a Degree of Higher Educational Institution in Finance, Business, Engineering, or a quantitative field of study', 'Â·        Are Proficient of the MS Office suite. ERP knowledge (i.e. SAP) is also a desirable attribute.', 'Â·        Are fluent in the English language.', 'Â·        Have negotiation skills.', 'Â·        Have developed communication skills with an emphasis on the ability to exercise influence.', 'Â·        Have the ability to communicate well and collaborate with internal customers and suppliers.', 'Â·        Have adaptive thinking and perception.', 'Â·        Have a developed level of initiative with an emphasis on the ability to make quick decisions and the ability to solve problems immediately.', 'Benefits', 'Â·   Competitive Remuneration Package', 'Â·   Career Development and Training', 'Â·   A working environment where you feel valued and appreciated', 'Â·   Mon - Fri Full Time']

details: ['At DTS Cloud Security, an integral part of the DTS Group, we are at the forefront of innovation in cyber security, managed services and technologies. With our two high-tech data centers and our own security software, we offer customized hybrid solutions to our clients. Enjoy working in one of our 14 locations, with flat hierarchies and an open-door culture. Discover exciting opportunities with us, where your ideas are valued and your journey is our priority. details: ['The University of Nicosia invites applications for the role of Information Technology Officer for our upcoming Athens campus. This role is essential for maintaining the integrity and performance of the campusâ€™s IT infrastructure and ensuring the delivery of reliable, secure, and efficient technological support to all users.', '*Subject to meeting all regulatory and legal requirements in Cyprus and Greece.', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Technology Infrastructure Management:', 'Technology Infrastructure Management', 'Oversee the management and maintenance of the Athens campus IT systems, including networks, hardware, and software.', 'Install, upgrade, and maintain computer systems, including servers and workstations, network equipment, and technology platforms.', 'Define technical specifications for equipment and oversee procurement processes.', 'User Support and Training:', of systems and tools.', 'Cybersecurity and Policy Compliance:', 'Cybersecurity and Policy Compliance', 'Implement, enforce, and monitor data protection policies and IT security protocols.', 'Ensure systems are compliant with regulatory and university-wide IT standards.', 'Budget and Performance Oversight:', 'Budget and Performance Oversight', 'Manage the IT budget and track expenditures.', and Competencies:', 'Skills and Competencies', 'Proficiency in networking, system administration, and troubleshooting.', 'Strong project coordination and vendor negotiation skills.', 'Fluency in Greek and English.', 'Personal Attributes:', 'Personal Attributes', 'High level of integrity, accuracy, and professionalism.', 'Problem-solving mindset with the ability to work under pressure.', 'Commitment to service excellence in an academic environment.', 'About the University of Nicosia:', 'About the University of Nicosia:', 'The University of Nicosia (UNIC) is one of the leading comprehensive research-oriented universities in the Mediterranean region, committed to teaching, research, and innovation, sustainability, societal engagement, and contribution to culture.', 'UNIC offers more than 100 conventional face-to-face (on campus) and distance learning online programs at the Bachelorâ€™s, Masterâ€™s, and Doctoral degree levels, hosting more than 12,500 students from over 100 countries.', 'UNIC conducts extensive high-quality basic, applied, and interdisciplinary research that benefits society on a national and global scale. Our teaching and research staff excel in many academic disciplines and are acknowledged for their contribution to the creation and advancement of knowledge and technology transfer, with a particular focus on emerging technologies of the Fourth Industrial Revolution and their impact on society.', 'Application Procedure:', 'Application Procedure:', 'Interested candidates are invited to apply by submitting the following documents:', 'Cover Letter: Describe your interest in the position and how your background aligns with the role.', 'Cover Letter', 'Curriculum Vitae (CV): Detailed CV highlighting relevant experience and achievements.', 'Curriculum Vitae (CV)', 'References: Contact information for at least two professional references.', 'References', 'How to Apply:', 'How to Apply:', 'Please submit your application through our online recruitment system.', 'For confidential inquiries or questions about the position, please contact:\nHR Department\nEmail: hr@unic.ac.cy', 'HR Department', 'Application Deadline:', 'Application Deadline:', 'Review of applications will begin immediately and continue until the position is filled.']

details: ['As a mid-level ESM / ITSM Consultant, you will be an integral part of our Service Management Delivery team. You will be responsible for translating business requirements to technical specifics and developing software architecture and design based on client or company requirements. You will work with management to define software requirements and take the lead on operational and technical projects. The role requires the ability to work independently with little supervision. The goal is to build /configure high-quality software solutions using low-code platforms  that are aligned with user needs and business goals.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Leads in configuring, maintaining, enhancing, and supporting commercial software packages.', 'Leads in customizing and adding new features to commercial software according to end-user requests.', 'Leads the maintenance of day-to-day operations of various applications.', "Leads in designing and building new applications based on customer's requirements and specifications.", 'Writes and performs tests for applications, fixes problems as they arise, and assists with product launches.', 'Provides technical support and troubleshoots problems related to applications.', 'Writes technical documentation and uses best development practices regarding version control and testing.', 'Performs software upgrades and keeps track of software licensing.', 'Direct involvement with vendors, managing relationships, including scoping of application services and review of deliverables.', 'Assists with presales activities and demonstrations.', 'Qualifications:', '3+ years of work experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer.', 'BSc degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or relevant field.', 'Experience with test-driven low code development, RDBMS, and ITIL v3 / ITIL v4.', 'Proficiency in software engineering tools.', 'Ability to document requirements and specifications.', 'Experience in reporting tools like Grafana will be appreciated.', 'Experience in system administration is a plus.', 'Experience working with Operations Management tools and Service Management tools will be appreciated.', 'Enthusiastic to take new initiatives.', 'Ability to guide lower-level engineers.', 'Proficient in English.', 'Benefits:', 'As an equal-opportunity employer, we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.', 'Our company is people - -centric and offers personalized benefits to each employee:', 'We want you to be well compensated for what you bring in, so we offer an attractive salary package', 'Your health matters to us, so all colleagues have a private health insurance plan from day one', 'We are excited for challenges, so you are invited to take part in exciting projects', 'We never stop learning and evolving! You will have your own mentor and training program to help you develop in a company with unlimited possibilities, and you will join our training sessions and online courses that we provide', 'We love the Relational vibes, so we gather on smaller and bigger occasions to celebrate good times together!', "Relational Financial Solutions adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation principles by applying its Privacy Policy, which is published at https://www.relationalfs.com/legal-information/pri.... By submitting an application to this position and by sharing your personal data with Relational Financial Solutions, you acknowledge and accept its Policy and authorize Relational Financial Solutions to process your personal data for the purposes of the company's recruitment opportunities, in line with the Policy."]

role: SAP Business Solutions Manager, TEMES SA
details: ['TEMES Group is a leading investor, developer and operator of high-end tourism and real estate destinations in Greece.', 'The Group owns Costa Navarino, one of the largest tourism investments in the Mediterranean. The destination encompasses five distinct resort areas developed on 1,000 hectares, featuring 5-star hotels, luxury private residences, signature golf courses, and many year-round facilities and activities.', 'The Group also controls Ionian Hotel Enterprises S.A., owner of a historic and flagship property in the center of Athens, former Hilton Athens, which is currently being transformed into a new city destination.', 'Additionally, TEMES has partnered with Lamda Development S.A. with the majority stake in the joint development of two state-of-the-art hotels along with branded residences in the framework of the landmark project of The Ellinikon, which aims to put the â€˜Athens Rivieraâ€™ on the global tourism map.', 'We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced SAP Business Solutions Manager to join our IT team. This role will be responsible for overseeing the implementation, maintenance, and optimization of SAP systems, specifically focusing on the MM (Materials Management), FI (Financial Accounting), and SD (Sales and Distribution) modules. The SAP Business Solutions Manager will ensure that these systems effectively support business operations and drive efficiency across the organization, managing both vendor relationships and an in-house team. The position will be reporting to the IT Director.', 'SAP Business Solutions Manager', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap implementation:', 'Business Partnership and Technology Roadmap implementation', 'Understand and address business needs and challenges related to SAP solutions, including MM, FI, and SD modules.', 'Key contributor in developing and driving the SAP strategy and roadmap, ensuring alignment with business objectives.', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to select and deliver effective SAP solutions, working closely with vendor partners and internal teams.', 'Build and lead a skilled team dedicated to SAP solutions development, including identifying key roles, recruiting top talent, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.', 'Project Management:', 'Project Management', 'Coordinate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide solutions.', 'Oversee the implementation and optimization of SAP MM, FI, and SD modules to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.', 'Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources effectively to ensure successful delivery.', 'Vendor and Team Management:', 'Vendor and Team Management:', 'Manage relationships with SAP vendors to ensure effective delivery of services and solutions.', 'Lead and mentor an in-house team, providing direction and support to ensure high performance and professional growth.', 'Facilitate effective communication between vendors, IT, and business units to ensure mutual understanding and cooperation.', 'Collaboration and Communication:', 'Collaboration and Communication', 'Ensure effective communication between IT and business units.', 'Conduct regular meetings to discuss progress, challenges, and opportunities for improvement.', 'Change Management:', 'Change Management', 'Lead efforts to ensure smooth adoption of SAP technologies and address any resistance to change.', 'Develop and implement change management strategies to support SAP initiatives.', 'Performance Metrics:', 'Performance Metrics', 'Define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of SAP initiatives.', 'Conduct regular performance reviews to ensure goals are met and identify areas for improvement.', 'Requirements', '5-8 years of experience in IT, with significant experience in SAP implementation and management, particularly with MM, FI, and SD modules.', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field', 'SAP certification is highly desirable', 'Masterâ€™s degree is a plus.', 'Strong configuration and hands-on experience with SAP MM, FI, and SD modules. Knowledge of integration with other SAP modules and external applications.', 'Strong knowledge of business processes analysis and challenges', 'Passionate about delivering solutions and solving customer and business problems', 'Experience with Product Lifecycle Management, project management tools and methodologies (e.g. Agile, Scrum)', 'Strong decision-making skills and ability to prioritize initiatives.', 'Exceptional interpersonal skills for working cross functionally across organizational levels with the ability to collaborate across a diverse, multi-functional environment', 'Strong team management skills, provide direction and mentorship to his/her team (junior to mid-level experience)', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary and benefits package.', 'Opportunities for professional development and continuous learning.', 'Collaborative and innovative work environment.']
tags: ['business solutions', 'sap', 'it']

details: ['Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Work directly with internal clients to gather requirements, analyze processes, and design customized ERP/CRM solutions.', 'Lead ERP/CRM system implementation projects, ensuring they are delivered on time and within budget.', 'Configure and customize ERP/CRM systems according to client needs.', 'Provide training to clients on the new system and ensure smooth adoption.', 'Offer ongoing support and troubleshooting after the system has been implemented.', 'Continuously identify areas for improvement within the ERP/CRM systems to maximize client satisfaction and efficiency.', 'Qualifications:', 'Qualifications:', 'Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business, IT, or a related field.', '3 years of experience working with ERP/CRM systems (SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics, Targit, etc.).', 'Experience with ERP/CRM implementation and customization is essential.', 'Ability to understand business processes and recommend ERP/CRM solutions accordingly.', 'Excellent communication skills and the ability to work with various stakeholders.', 'Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.']

details: ['ROLE SUMMARY', 'The External Supply/Supplier Collaboration (ESSC) Solutions Manager reports to the Digital Solutions Team Lead and will be responsible for the following functions:', 'Technical/Digital supporting the solution for procurement of direct materials, including the Supplier Chain Collaboration (SCC) Solution.', "Learn and gain expertise in Pfizer's global model template focusing on SAP solution governing procurement of Raw and Packaging materials for the manufacturing plant, as well as procurement of API, bulk and finished goods from contract manufacturers (CMO).", "Learn Pfizer's Business Processes relevant to ES&SC solution areas.", 'Support implementation strategy & timelines for next generation Supplier Collaboration solution (SCC).', 'Engage business user groups to ensure efficient use of the software set.', 'Participate in and lead Pfizer Direct Procurement/External Supply change projects.', 'ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES', 'The ideal candidate must bring technical capabilities, an understanding of Agile methodologies, a strong desire to learn & implement new digital technologies and solutions, as well as a keen interest in direct procurement business processes. Key activities include:', 'Deliver world class External Supply & Supplier Collaboration solutions to Pfizer.', 'Develop technical specification and estimations for assigned projects.', 'Conduct business requirements gathering meetings and workshops in an efficient and productive manner and documents minutes, notes and requirements concisely.', 'Collaborate and partner closely with global Digital teams and business teams to deliver solutions on time and within budget.', 'Develop cost estimates for projects, spend forecast and maintain project financial details in Pfizer internal tools and project portfolio systems.', 'Manage the design, configuration, development, testing and implementation of projects.', 'Coordinate activities with cross-functional teams located in diverse geographical locations, including the engagement of key business stakeholders to contribute to the business process and system development life cycle.', 'Develop strong relationships at all levels and with different cultural backgrounds.', 'Provide technical and functional guidance to key stakeholder', 'Communicate effectively to manage business expectations.', 'Ensure compliance to GMP, deployment standards and quality guidelines with regulatory related obligations are executed with the highest standards of compliance.', 'Leverage agile methodologies for solution planning and project execution.', 'Assist production support team to fix problems in a timely manner.', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', "Bachelor's degree in computer science or related IT discipline.", 'Experience working on SAP Material Management Module, knowledge IDOCS and integration points with MRP in PP, APO and Distribution.', 'Effective communication skills with the ability to build relationships and influence outcomes.', '5+ years of relevant experience in a technology position(s).', 'Experienced working for a large corporate organization.', 'Excellent documentation and organizational skills.', 'Knowledge of the software development lifecycles using agile principles.', 'Quick learner. Demonstrate initiative and ownership.', 'Ability to operate in a global multi-cultural environment of time zones and requirements.', 'Business process acumen understanding of GMP requirements.', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Advanced degree.', 'Experience in SAP DP, SCC.', 'Experienced working with global applications.', 'Work Location Assignment: Hybrid', 'Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.', 'To apply please visit our website www.pfizercareers.com and search job Manager/ Program Manager - (ESSC) Solutions id 4935463.']
tags: ['program manager', 'essc solutions', 'pfizer', 'it', 'thessaloniki', 'Î¸ÎµÏƒÏƒÎ±Î»Î¿Î½Î¹ÎºÎ·']

details: ["Interested in working with us but didn't find an open job that suits your profile? Are you curious enough to find out more about what you can achieve when joining us?", 'Send us your CV and let us know what you are looking for. We will contact you as soon as a suitable opportunity arises!', 'Requirements', 'Requirements', "We accept candidates with diverse background and we hire without discrimination for any characteristic protected by law (age, color, sex, etc). All curriculum Vitae's are treated with utmost confidentiality.", 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'We offer:', '- A vivid, dynamic working environment', '- Both full time and part time job opportunities', '- Constant training & development', '- Opportunities for growth', '- Attractive remuneration package matching your experience and profile', 'Please note that our company treats all data according to Law 4624/2019 and the European General Regulation for Data Protection (GDPR) 2016/679. We maintain and process these data with the sole purpose of examining your candidacy and communicating with you, and their recipients are exclusively those authorized for this purpose. By submitting your information you declare that it is true and accurate. Moreover, that you accept the retention of this data in our records for a period of one (1) year and that after this time, if you still wish to express your interest in working with us, you will have to submit it again. If you have any question or request in relation to the above you can submit it to: contact-DPO@fysikoaerioellados.gr']

details: ['Kariera.Group is looking for a skilled and motivated DevOps Software Engineer to join our engineering team!', 'Kariera.Group', 'DevOps Software Engineer', 'As a leading key player for recruiting in the global job market, we empower employment through every product, service or initiative we produce and support, across Europe and Asia.', 'We have one clear mission: to match the perfect candidate with the right job!', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Design, implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate the software delivery process.', 'Collaborate with software development and IT operations teams to improve deployment processes.', 'Maintain and optimise cloud infrastructure resources for performance and cost-effectiveness.', 'Ensure robust system monitoring and troubleshooting to minimise downtime and enhance application performance.', 'Participate in the software release management and version control processes', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Solid experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.', 'Strong background in programming and scripting languages like Python, Java, or Bash.', 'Proficient with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.', 'Experience with container orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.', 'Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work within a collaborative team environment.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary package with performance-based bonuses.', 'Flexible working hours with the option for remote work.', 'Comprehensive health insurance and wellness initiatives.', 'Opportunities for career advancement in a forward-thinking organisation.', 'Join Kariera.Group  and take your career to new heights!', 'Apply now to become a key player in our software development transformation journey!']

['You will have a significant technical contribution to large-scale implementation projects', 'You will be given the opportunity to work and take responsibility in challenging engagements in Greece and abroad', 'Your ability to learn and apply advanced Technology solutions, will give you the opportunity to grow professionally and participate in the design and deployment of leading-edge technologies.', "A Bachelor's degree in one of the fields of Computer Science, Software Engineering, or other related discipline", 'Ability to work as a team member', 'Self-motivated to contribute with your own ideas - showcase the feasibility and benefits with a proof of concept and document your cutting edge solution', 'Experience in Java or other object-oriented programming language', 'Completed military obligations (where applicable)', 'Experience in SQL and PL/SQL', 'Working experience with at least one RDBMS e.g. Oracle (preferably), SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.', 'Familiarity with IDE tools e.g. JDeveloper (preferably), Visual Studio etc.', 'Knowledge and/or experience with web services (SOAP, JSON/REST)', 'Knowledge and/or experience with Oracle ADF', 'Knowledge and/or experience with Angular, Ionic or Node.js', 'Knowledge and/or experience with source control software (e.g. GIT, SVN, TFS)', 'Ability to design and develop solutions with business users (feel free to include relevant project and profile links, like GitHub, Kaggle or Stack Overflow)', 'Work experience either in Insurance sector, or in a solution provider environment engaged with Insurance projects implementation', "Competitive remuneration package: You'll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Depending on your experience, our comprehensive rewards package includes benefits that suit your needs including cutting-edge technological equipment, ticket restaurant vouchers, a private health insurance scheme, life insurance, income protection and an exclusive EY benefits club that provides a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions.", "Flexible working arrangements: We operate under a hybrid working model, which is defined based on both your own preferences and team's needs, and we enjoy our summers with short Fridays.", 'Personalized learning experience and career development: We provide free and unlimited access to educational platforms and EY Badges, support certifications, and provide coaching and feedback, as a part of our Leadership & Development process, all of which can lead to a meaningful impact and success as defined by you.', "Transformative leadership: We'll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.", "Diverse and inclusive culture: You'll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.", 'International Experience: Become part of international projects and work along multicultural teams, through our global network.', 'Above all, you will be working in one of the most recognized employers in Greece, as we have been awarded the Top Employers, Great Place to Work and Best Workplaces for Women awards for 2024.']

company: Kariera Group Recruitment Services| Executive Level (C-Level & Senior Talent Acquisition)
details: ['Kariera.Group is looking for a skilled and motivated DevOps Software Engineer to join our engineering team!', 'Kariera.Group', 'DevOps Software Engineer', 'As a leading key player for recruiting in the global job market, we empower employment through every product, service or initiative we produce and support, across Europe and Asia.', 'We have one clear mission: to match the perfect candidate with the right job!', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Role and Responsibilities', 'Design, implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate the software delivery process.', 'Collaborate with software development and IT operations teams to improve deployment processes.', 'Maintain and optimise cloud infrastructure resources for performance and cost-effectiveness.', 'Ensure robust system monitoring and troubleshooting to minimise downtime and enhance application performance.', 'Participate in the software release management and version control processes', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Solid experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.', 'Strong background in programming and scripting languages like Python, Java, or Bash.', 'Proficient with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.', 'Experience with container orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.', 'Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work within a collaborative team environment.', 'Benefits', 'Benefits', 'Competitive salary package with performance-based bonuses.', 'Flexible working hours with the option for remote work.', 'Comprehensive health insurance and wellness initiatives.', 'Opportunities for career advancement in a forward-thinking organisation.', 'Join Kariera.Group  and take your career to new heights!', 'Apply now to become a key player in our software development transformation journey!']

details: ['Key Responsibilities:', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Develop and maintain back-end services using .NET Core 8+, C#, and VB.NET.', 'Build interactive, responsive front-end UIs using Blazor, Bootstrap.', 'Design and interact with relational databases, particularly SQL Server.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.', 'Write unit tests to ensure reliability and maintainability of code', 'Participate in code reviews and help improve team standards and development practices', 'Technical Skills Required:', 'Technical Skills Required:', 'Proficient in .NET Core, C#, and VB.NET.', 'Experience building RESTful Web APIs.', 'Solid understanding of Blazor for front-end development.', 'Familiarity with Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS.', 'Strong knowledge of SQL Server and database design principles.', 'Qualifications:', 'Qualifications:', '2â€“5 years of experience in a similar role.', 'BSc and MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.', 'Proven experience developing full-stack web applications.', 'Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.', 'Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team.', 'Nice to Have:', 'Nice to Have:', 'Experience with DevOps pipelines and CI/CD tools.', 'Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure or AWS).', 'Exposure to AI or machine learning techniques, such as working with ML libraries (e.g., ML.NET, TensorFlow, or Python-based tools), or integrating intelligent features into applications.', 'A public GitHub portfolio or other demonstrable code samples that show contributions, coding style, and project experience.', 'Why Join Us?', 'Why Join Us?', "We are a fintech company with a strong passion for delivering tailored solutions that streamline our customers' day-to-day operations. Our team embraces agile methodologies, encouraging continuous improvement, collaboration, and rapid iteration to meet evolving business needs. You'll be part of a dynamic environment where innovation is encouraged, and your contributions have a real impact.", 'We offer a hybrid work model, combining the flexibility of remote work with the benefits of in-person collaboration, and provide a competitive remuneration package that reflects your skills and experience.']

We are one of the most advanced companies globally owning state-of-the art production lines in our 12 factories in Europe. Alumil, is a family-owned business that also embraces all of its employees like family. Our cultureâ€™s primary focus is on integrity, team spirit, initiative, loyalty, sustainability and â€œmerakiâ€ (spirited work).', 'ALUMIL opposes any discrimination, unequal treatment and violation of human rights and ensures the provision of equal opportunities at work. ['What Impact will you make?', 'What Impact will you make?', 'Are you looking for an opportunity in Thessaloniki that offers you a hybrid working model?', 'opportunity', 'Thessaloniki', 'hybrid working model', 'Are you ready to work on large scale projects for industry-leading clients around the world and elevate your career to an international level?', 'large scale', 'projects for industry-leading clients', 'career', 'international level', 'If so, check below for more info about this career opportunity!', 'opportunity', 'You bring passion, we bring opportunities!', '#YourOpportunity', '#YourOpportunity', 'Deloitte is a worldwide leader in Professional Services with a presence in more than 150 countries and territories. Since 2018, Deloitte has been operating its Alexander Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina - which are model hubs of expertise, training, and innovation, specializing in cutting-edge exponential technologies, in which graduates and young professionals undergo immersive experiences, continuous learning, gaining practical insights and hands-on training that empower them to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape.', 'Competence Center in Thessaloniki with satellites in the cities of Patras, Heraklion, and Ioannina', 'Deloitte is an ideal working environment for both young and senior professionals who want to take the next step in their careers, offering them a supportive and international working environment that leverages their expertise and potential. Its corporate culture is based on trust and collaboration and ensures diversity and inclusion so that everyone feels part of a great team.', 'both young and senior professionals', 'We are currently seeking young graduates to join our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory team in Thessaloniki!', 'Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory', 'Thessaloniki', 'Are you an ambitious team player with exceptional analytical skills and a well-rounded personality?', 'Are you a highly motivated graduate, who enjoys IT systems & Software Development Life Cycle and would flourish as part of a diverse team?', 'Are you interested in IT business risks and services designed to determine acceptable exposure levels, implement controls, and provide follow-up as well as a constant monitoring on Quality?', 'Apply now and seize the opportunity to jumpstart on your career and become part of our dynamic team in our offices in Thessaloniki.', '#YourServiceLine', '#YourServiceLine', 'Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory', 'Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) Advisory', "Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T) is an end-to-end strategic advisory practice, enabling our C-suite clients to make informed, robust decisions and strategic choices. It integrates the full scale of Deloitte's M&A capabilities, consolidates Climate & Sustainability advisory capabilities, and tightens the connection between strategy development and risk management to assist clients with navigating uncertainty and change.", '#AboutYourTeam', '#AboutYourTeam', 'Quality & Compliance is a key department within Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory with an ambitious plan in terms of growth, innovation, talent management and market recognition. We help clients take advantage of the benefits of innovative new digital technology, support their digital transformation, regulatory compliance and control assurance, provide improved data driven leadership insights, and thus support growth and innovation.', '#AboutYourRole', '#AboutYourRole', 'As a Consultant in our Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory department, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our clients in identifying, assessing, and managing risks that may impact their business objectives. This role offers a unique opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams and leveraging your expertise to deliver value-added insights.', 'Consultant', 'You will in be part of a team that is responsible to:', 'â€¢ Provide guidance and support on computer system validation (CSV) and software assurance;', 'â€¢ Support efforts to drive consistent interpretation of CSV and incorporate into the SDLC process;', 'â€¢ Provide regulatory compliance guidance (e.g. FDA, Part 11).', '#OurRequirements', '#OurRequirements', 'Key Qualifications', 'Key Qualifications', 'The ideal candidate should have the following requirements:', 'â€¢ You have a Master degree in Computer Science Engineering, Mathematical Engineering, Sciences, Bachelor in Informatics;', 'â€¢ You see Technology as a business enabler and have an interest in the latest trends.', 'â€¢ You are keen on daily interaction and close collaboration with the client.', 'â€¢ You are analytical, proactive and know how to tackle a problem.', 'â€¢ You adapt easily to changing circumstances as you enjoy new challenges every day.', 'â€¢ You are a team player and you communicate smoothly;', 'â€¢ You have a sound knowledge of English other languages are a plus e.g. French, and have an excellent knowledge of MS Office applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, â€¦).', 'Bonus Qualifications', 'Bonus Qualifications', 'â€¢ Experience in computer system validation (CSV) or life science industry is a plus;', "If you're ready to take your career to the next level in a challenging international environment, focusing on continuous learning and dynamic teamwork, both in Greece and abroad, you're ready for Deloitte!", '#WhatWeOffer', '#WhatWeOffer', 'At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits:', 'ğŸ  Modern hybrid workplace, characterized by flexibility and Smart Working', 'âš– Empowered well-being: We provide multiple program offerings to support your well-being needs (flexible working arrangements, extra days of leave, parental allowances)', 'ğŸŒ Engagement within international large-scale teams and projects, with opportunities to travel for training or client purposes.', 'ğŸ“š Constant opportunities for learning with unlimited access to internal and external learning platforms and sponsored certificates aligned with business needs and technology trends', 'ğŸš€ Challenging and innovating environment where personal development and growth are encouraged, always with transparency and trust', 'ğŸ¤¼ Diverse culture and active communities that enable you to bring yourself to work', 'ğŸ‰ Team Building and Corporate Social Responsibility Activities', 'ğŸƒ A buddy to support you with your onboarding', 'ğŸŒ´ Extra days of annual leave', 'âš• Private medical health insurance plan', 'ğŸ’³ Ticket restaurant card', 'ğŸ›’ Exclusive Discounts to several retail providers, restaurants and others', 'ğŸ“± Mobile phone', 'ğŸ Fresh fruits and unlimited coffee everyday at our offices', 'Please note that all well-being benefits mentioned above are subject to annual review.', 'About Deloitte', 'About Deloitte', '#OurServices', '#OurServices', 'Deloitte offers integrated services that include Audit, Technology & Transformation, Financial Advisory, Strategy Risk & Transactions Advisory, Tax and Legal. Our approach combines insight and innovation from multiple disciplines with global business and industry expertise to help our clients excel anywhere in the world. We deliver outstanding impact on the reputation and success of our clients, in Italy and globally. In pursuing this we contribute to a sustainable and prosperous society, and are firm believers in the positive impact business can and should have on the world it operates within.', '#OurPurpose', '#OurPurpose', "We are led by a purpose, to make an impact that matters with clients, people and society. This purpose defines who we are and what we stand for. It's not about being the biggest. Itâ€™s about being the first choice for the largest and most influential clients, and the first choice for the best talent.", '#OurValues', '#OurValues', 'At Deloitte we foster a collaborative culture where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service through our expertise and professionalism. We value difference, with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.', '#OurTalentExperience', '#OurTalentExperience', 'From day one at our firm, practitioners are part of a community. Our development and career progression framework will help them develop the skills and capabilities to succeed. The wellness of our people and the ability to offer agile working arrangements is at the center of our unique talent experience. We create a workplace that encourages collaboration, creativity, inclusiveness to ensure our staff are supported, encouraged and feel a sense of purpose and meaning in what they do each day.', 'Sounds like the sort of role for you? ['Software Engineer', 'Some of your most important tasks could be summarized as following:', 'Producing efficient, reliable, and secure code.', 'Reusing already implemented core components to speed up development.', 'Undertaking specific tasks from the team leads and eventually produce own detailed designs of implementation approach.', 'Identifying and fixing performance problems and security vulnerabilities on the produced code.', 'Specifying and performing unit tests to ensure code integrity.', 'Performing integration tests to assure quality of produced software.', 'Identifying and proposing improvement opportunities in the code to promote maintainability, performance and security.', 'Contributing to the creation of the system design and functional specifications.', 'To be a successful candidate, your professional profile should match the following criteria:', 'You hold a University or College Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or relevant field, including Mathematics and Physics.', 'Previous professional experience for this position is important! details: ['Job description', 'MainSys is a high-tech company that for the last 19 years develops, integrates and supports large-scale IT projects in Greece and abroad. Being passionate about our work has helped us grow exponentially. Our investment in resources and technology resulted in innovative services that fulfill even the most demanding needs. We are currently seeking a highly motivated PHP Back-End Developer. The primary responsibility will be to work with our project management, design, and development teams along with our clients to produce everything from comprehensive new Projects to introducing new features & functionality to existing ones.', 'MainSys', 'PHP Back-End Developer', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'We are seeking a Back-End Developer who is experienced and can work independently. details:
['Kariera.Group Recruitment Services is seeking an experienced Customer Service Supervisor to join a leading company in the food industry, known for its dedication to sustainability and quality. The company specializes in raw materials and serves artisans, retailers, industrial clients, in over 100 countries. This role offers the opportunity to lead a team and manage key logistics and customer service operations in a fast-paced environment.', 'Kariera.Group Recruitment Services', 'Customer Service Supervisor', 'Job Description: We are looking for a proactive and organized Customer Service Supervisor to join the team in Oinofyta. This position involves leading a team, managing orders (sales orders & stock transfers), and connecting these with other processes and communication with other departments.  This position also involves optimizing logistics, improving communication, and working with various departments to ensure smooth operations.', 'Job Description:', 'Location: Oinofyta (Hybrid: 2-3 remote working days per month)', 'Location', 'Key responsibilities:', 'Key responsibilities:', 'â€¢    Lead and supervise a team managing orders and intra-company stock transfers.
â€¢    Oversee logistics processes related to product transfers, ensuring compliance with invoicing policies and procedures.
â€¢    Utilize SAP to manage orders, invoicing, and related supply chain operations.
â€¢    Collaborate with internal departments to streamline workflows, optimize communication, and implement organizational changes.
â€¢    Monitor and analyze Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and implement corrective actions as needed.
â€¢    Organize and lead customer service meetings to enhance delivery performance.
â€¢    Drive digitization initiatives and identify cost-saving opportunities.
â€¢    Manage customs and ensure compliance with food regulatory documentation for exports.', 'â€¢', 'Required qualifications:', 'Required qualifications:', 'â€¢    Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Finance, or a related field 
â€¢    5+ years of experience in customer service, order management, or logistics
â€¢    Proficiency in SAP (mandatory) and MS Office 
â€¢    Fluent in English (oral and written) with native proficiency in Greek
â€¢    Solid knowledge of invoicing policies and processes related to product transfers
â€¢    Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills
â€¢    Proven ability to lead teams, collaborate across departments, and adapt to organizational changes', 'SAP', 'mandatory', 'English', 'Proven', 'The company offers:', 'The company offers:', 'â€¢    Competitive compensation package and annual performance bonus .
â€¢    Private medical insurance and a private pension plan .
â€¢    Company-provided transportation from Athens and Chalkida .
â€¢    Laptop and mobile phone provided .
â€¢    Opportunities for continuous training and professional growth .']

Being passionate about our work has helped us grow exponentially. Our investment in resources and technology resulted in innovative services that fulfill even the most demanding needs. We are currently seeking a highly motivated React Mobile Developer. The primary responsibility will be to work with our project management, design, and development teams along with our clients to produce everything from comprehensive new Projects to introducing new features & functionality to existing ones.', 'Responsibilities', 'We are seeking a React Mobile Developer who is experienced and can work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. The ideal candidate should be able to work with top-level objectives and manage a project from start to finish, including planning, technical execution, and review.', 'Work directly with the project management team on a daily basis.', 'Collaborate with other team members on deployment tasks.', 'Stay up-to-date with industry best practices.', 'Assess, time-estimate, accept, and update user stories and tasks assigned.', 'Deliver work that meets outlined requirements within appropriate timeframes.', 'Proactively present new ideas and contribute to the evolution of company best practice', 'Qualifications', 'At least 2 years of proven experience as a React Mobile Developer, along with a portfolio.', 'Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including ES6+ features.', 'Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.', 'Experience with state management tools such as Redux-toolkit, Zustand, or Context API.', 'Familiarity with modern front-end build tools (e.g., Webpack, Vite, Babel, npm/yarn).', 'Experience working with RESTful APIs or GraphQL.', 'Understanding of component-based architecture and reusable UI patterns.', 'Knowledge of version control systems, such as Git.', 'Ability to write clean, modular, and testable code.', 'Familiarity with UI frameworks or libraries (e.g., Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Bootstrap).', 'Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.', 'Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment and communicate technical concepts clearly.', 'Benefits', 'Opportunities for professional development and growth', 'Competitive remuneration package based on years of experience', 'Health insurance', 'Transportation expenses', 'Flexible working hours', 'Performance-based bonuses', 'Fun Company Activities']

details:
["We're Hiring: Junior Java Developer with QA & Documentation Skills", "About Olympus Marine Group:
We specialize in energy-saving systems, custom software development, and real-time data transmission technologies. Our mission is to deliver high-performance tech solutions to the maritime and industrial sectors â€” and we're growing fast.", 'The Role:
Weâ€™re looking for a Junior Java Developer whoâ€™s not just comfortable with code, but also values quality and clear communication. Youâ€™ll work across multiple areas, including:
Java development on real-time systems and custom tools
Writing and maintaining technical documentation (APIs, system overviews, release notes, etc.)
Supporting the QA process, including manual and automated testing, and collaborating closely with our senior engineers and product leads', 'Ideal Candidate:
â€¢    1â€“2 years of experience in Java (Spring Boot or similar frameworks a plus)

â€¢    Strong attention to detail and a willingness to learn multiple aspects of the software lifecycle', 'Why Join Us?', 'Work in a specialized, high-tech marine environment

details: ['About the Role:', 'About the Role:', "This role is ideal for a detail-oriented and analytical professional who enjoys balancing financial analysis with client communication. details: ['Job description', 'MainSys is a high-tech company that for the last 19 years develops, integrates and supports large-scale IT projects in Greece and abroad. Being passionate about our work has helped us grow exponentially. Our investment in resources and technology resulted in innovative services that fulfill even the most demanding needs. We are currently seeking a highly motivated .NET Back-End Developer. The primary responsibility will be to work with our project management, design, and development teams along with our clients to produce everything from comprehensive new Projects to introducing new features & functionality to existing ones.', 'MainSys', '.NET Back-End Developer', 'Responsibilities', 'Responsibilities', 'We are seeking a .ÎÎ•Î¤ Developer who is experienced and can work independently. ['Digital Winners, one of the most successful marketing companies, owning
the leading Greek iGaming Affiliate Network with 50+ sites (e.g., Foxbet.gr,
Sentragoal.gr, Foxcasino.gr, Bookmakers.gr) for online sports betting and
casino, with expertise in:', 'Digital Winners,', 'â€¢ Affiliate Marketing
â€¢ Content Marketing
â€¢ SEO
â€¢ Video Content Performance', 'We are looking for a Tech Lead to drive a small team of developers to innovate and enhance an i-gaming platform product which will be used both internally and as white label by partners. As a Tech Lead you would be primarily focused on leading the technology within the team. The primary role responsibility is to guide the team in technical matters to achieve successful delivery of quality solutions.', 'Tech Lead', 'Tech Lead', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', 'â€¢ Technical Expertise â€“Understand deeply the software development lifecycle, principles and the technologies used. Encourage best practices, provide support and guidance, as well as share the understanding new technologies and trends.', 'Technical Expertise', 'â€¢ Architecture â€“ Be responsible for the overall design and definition of the system architecture, be involved in key technical decisions and evaluating trade-offs, considering performance, scalability and work towards a solution that provides the team with a system that is simple
and effective.', 'Architecture', 'â€¢ Quality Assurance â€“ Be responsible for the overall quality of a system or service, and so thereâ€™s often a need to set and enforce quality standards. This includes talking to the team about best practices and being involved in Code Reviews to promote maintainable, scalable code, and adhere to the best practices.', 'Quality Assurance', 'â€¢ Collaboration â€“ Bridge the gap between the business and the technology, helping to translate business requirements to the team and vice versa, communicate technical challenges and limitations to the business.', 'Collaboration', 'â€¢ Team responsibilities â€“ Since this is a very small team, the time invested to team management is expected to be short, but from a responsibility perspective they would still belong to the tech lead.', 'Team responsibilities', 'â€¢ Delegating tasks', 'â€¢ Time management and reporting', 'â€¢ Team performance evaluations', 'Required Skills:', 'Required Skills:', 'â€¢ Software architecture
Knowing how to organize functionality in systems and subsystems systems and their relationship to each other. Knowing how to define the external properties of the hardware, Overseeing the construction of the software according to the architecture and provide technical direction to the team.', 'Software architecture', 'â€¢ Analytical thinking
Making educated decisions about complicated technical aspects of the products and ensuring adherence to the technical direction laid out by the executive managers.', 'Analytical thinking', 'â€¢ Problem-solving
Finding solutions to programming or software limitations and solving hard to find glitches with novel ways.', 'Problem-solving', 'â€¢ Attention to detail
Being able to notice the nuances of the technical solutions to ensure a high quality output from the team.', 'Attention to detail', 'â€¢ Coding', 'Coding', 'Being able to use at least PHP, JavaScript and HTML to be able to contribute to code reviews and ensure adherence to the technical direction and best practices.', 'PHP', 'JavaScript', 'HTML', 'â€¢ Leadership
Being able to support the time to ensure they have the resources and time to do their work well.', 'Leadership', 'Desirable Skills:', 'Desirable Skills:', 'Technologies, concepts and domains that we will be working with to create our media platform, knowledge of which would be highly desirable:', 'â€¢ Design and Development of Complex Distributed Real-Time Systems
â€¢ Microservices
â€¢ Payment systems
â€¢ Service Oriented Architecture
â€¢ Concurrent Processing and Multi-Threading
â€¢ High Availability
â€¢ Domain Driven Design', 'We Offer:
â€¢ Fun and creative work environment
â€¢ Informal workplace
â€¢ Competitive salary based on experience
â€¢ Opportunities to grow
â€¢ All the tech gear you need to work smart', 'We Offer:', 'The position is for full-time onsite work in Kallithea, Athens, Greece.', 'full-time onsite', 'Kallithea, Athens, Greece.']
